key.name: Wait a minute here. You're...
After the battle, atop $map:02000313$...
Is it over?
Ugh...
No. It's simply stopped moving... for now.
It won't stay down for long.
Then we'd better destroy it while we have a chance.
You can't! Its life force is tied to the war chief's!
If the Vayar falls, my father will, too!
So what? We're stuck up here, fighting forever?
What do we do...?
Won't you leave this problem to me?
Father!
I'm sorry if I worried you all. It seems I owe you a debt...
So please. Allow me to take care of this.
Father... What are you saying...?
The $npc:11003392$ and I are sworn to protect $map:02000051$, even if it costs us our lives.
I will see my duty through to the end.
What are you saying?!
There has to be another way. Let's think about this...
No. I will finish this with my own two hands.
This is our last chance. It's now or never.
$MyPCName$, $npc:11003389$ told me about you.
I hate to ask more of you, but... please look after my people.
Chief...
$npc:11003387$... son. You are now the war chief of $map:02000051$.
I know you will serve them better than I ever could. I leave the people of $map:02000051$ in your hands...
Father...
You're not going alone.
You don't expect all of the glory, do you?
You are my brother in arms. That means we stick together... to the very end.
$npc:11003393$... Looks like I'm getting you into trouble again. Good luck on the other side.
$npc:11003387$! I leave $npc:11003448$ in your care. I trust you will treat her with the respect she deserves.
I may not like it, but she adores you. I hope you two have lots of pups and make the Murpagoth strong.
Wh-what?!
The future is in our children's hands now. What do you say we face our ultimate battle together?
I would consider it an honor.
The honor is mine.
Raaaaugh!
It's time. Let's go!
Yaaaaah!
In my final moments... I have no regrets.
Thank you... Old friend...
Ah, that's better.
Thank you!
I think I can move now...
You're a lifesaver!
That was close.
Ugh, my head...
I can't remember a thing.
That was close!
Thank you!
Woof, woof! I'm okay now.
Thank you. Woof!
So... heavy... Woof!
Thank you. Woof!
Woof, woof! I'm okay now.
I owe you a favor! Woof!
Thank you. Woof!
Hmm?! Is that... Quickening Blood? Bring it to me. Meet me at the Ant Tunnel.
Fine, fine. I'll work!
Keep your hands off me!
Stop your nagging. I'm coming!
Just relax, will you?
I'm too tired for this!
Nope! Not gonna work!
Loosen up, would you?
You're such a nuisance!
Art thou who hast summoned me?
Only $npcName:11000039$ can soothe my rage!
If thou will not bring $npcName:11000039$, begone!
Screeeeech!
Thanks!
Screeeeech!
I was just resting!
Screeeeech!
Screeeeech!
Thanks!
I was just resting!
Who dare play a trick on me?!
Thou will regret summoning me!
Hot hot hot!
Who turned up the heat?!
Wh-what are you doing?!
Ouch!!
It burns!
Ack! Hot!
Fire!
Fire!
Squeeeeak!
Creeeak...
The shining door will close in 5 sec. You should hurry.
The shining door has closed.
The shining door will close in 5 sec. You should hurry.
The shining door has closed.
Minister, if I might have a moment of your time.
Huh? You're...
It was quite a shock. I always thought he was more cautious than that.
What did he say, exactly?
It was shortly before the incident. The archmage told $npc:11000033$ that he could sense something unusual from the subject.
Well, $MyPCName$ is rather unique. $male:He,female:She$ is fast and competent. I wish my servants had half of $male:his,female:her$ talent.
That's not what I meant by "unusual." Regardless, I disagree with how the archmage handled the situation.
I'm sure he had some kind of plan. A man like that doesn't take risks without carefully weighing the odds.
I think you're placing too much faith in him. Either that or you're scheming something.
Scheme? I never scheme. The minister of $map:02000001$ is above scheming!
I just hope he didn't make the wrong choice...

Woof!

<font size='50'>Boo!</font>

<font size='20'>Is this the best Tria has to offer?</font>
I am done cleaning and should go now. I am the janitor.

What a stupid question.

Hey, Junior.

You hear that, Scrawny?!

Save Joddy from the criminal lowlifes!
I might be able to avoid enemy patrols by walking along the ceiling pipes.

I'm moved to tears. Really.

Ugh...

I'm on it!

Back already?

$npcName:11003171$! Time for a rematch!

I can do this!

The enemy army has us completely surrounded.
We can't beat them in an open battlefield. We have to hold the fortress walls.
We have to hold them here. Green Hoods, form up at the choke point!
$MyPCName$, help us man the cannons.
We can't hold out much longer!
I'll go.
That was just the first wave. $MyPCName$, tend to the wounded before the next attack!
This isn't over yet. Everyone, back in formation!
So that's the one who ruined $npc:11001820$'s plans... $MyPCName$... I may find a use for $male:him,female:her$.
That's enough. Retreat... for now.
We held them off...
And I'm saying you can't trust him!
That man killed your father!
No... $npcName:11003216$ would never...

Sniff...!

Follow me.

$npcName:11001025$! Come on out!

$npcName:11003216$ says hello.

$npcName:11001025$!

Hand over the dough!

Bro?!
Bro!

I'm so glad!
Bro...

Why don't we introduce ourselves?

$male:He,female:She$ really is amazing.

Thank gosh you're okay.

After your meeting with $npcName:11001111$...

Hey, $npcName:11003274$! You finally decided to show up?
$MyPCName$! Today's the day I lock you up in $map:02000124$ and throw away the key!

Haven of Poverty

Bye!

Ugh! What... what are you...?!

$npcName:11001927$... Why? What about... the others...?

You won't... get away with this...!

Ugh...
You should have known your place. Too late to learn now, I guess. Well... I won't see you around.
Where am I...?
Don't get up. He stuck you pretty good.

...Thanks.

Revenge.

It shouldn't be hard for someone with your skills.
$npc:11003289$! Open your eyes! We can still purge the shadow seed that has grown within you!

What's going on here?!
$MyPCName$... I feared it would come to this.

$npcName:11003289$... The darkness has him!
I've grown bored. Let's finish this.

Who's there?!

I'll take the Black Moon Key.
Between fighting $npcName:11003289$ and maintaining the shield over $map:02000023$, $npc:11003283$ used every last bit of his magic.
He fell into a deep sleep. And $npcName:11003289$, whom he fought so hard to protect, was stolen by a mysterious stranger.
$map:52000101$ and $map:02000023$ are broken and unprotected. The survivors must prepare for an uncertain future, with no time to stop and grieve...
They've sounded the alarm. Escape the base!
He's over here!

You're not making it out of here alive!
Murderer!

You won't get away with this!
You're not going anywhere!

I look forward to our next meeting.
Because that day...
...will be your last.
$MyPCName$, are you okay?
Yes... Yes, I'm fine.
I wouldn't take anything the captain said to heart.

All I want is to help...

Absolutely not! I, for one, am glad to count you among my allies.
Thank you. I only hope I can prove myself in the days to come.
$MyPCName$! We have wounded in the infirmary!
What happened?

That's all I know.
I've got to hurry!

By a powerful wraith... The captain! He's in danger!

There's no time to get reinforcements. I have to go alone!
Captain! I'm here to help!
What are you doing here? This isn't the time for heroics!
I'm sorry. Am I not commanding your full attention?
And now you've brought an ally. How unfair. I say we even the playing field...
C-captain... This is our chance! While their forces are weakened!
I told you to stay back at camp!
I couldn't let you face these monsters alone, Captain.
Careless oaf! You aren't ready for this kind of action!
The best thing you can do now is stay out of my way.
I'm a Guardian $male:Priest,female:Priestess$, Captain! It's my duty to fight by your side!
...He's back.
Impressive magic... for a whelp.
I don't know what you are, but I will bring you to justice!
You may have defeated a few of my thralls, but you're still a mere child.
The arrogance of youth...
Enough!
You are going to tell us who you are, why you're here, and what happened to the $map:52000115$.

The $npcName:11001811$? Is that your leader?

Prepare yourself!
Tenacious vermin...

I won't let you get away!
No! Don't!
How does $male:he,female:she$ look?
$male:He'll,female:She'll$ live, thanks to you.
Physically, $male:he's,female:she's$ almost fully healed. But it may be some time before $male:he's,female:she's$ ready to face battle again...
This may not be the best time to say this, but...
If you had done as I asked...
My presence would have changed nothing.
I understand that you have no desire to fight another war.

Without a real Guardian Priest on our side, the casualties will continue to mount...

I... apologize if I've upset you.

I only hope their prayers are answered before it's too late...
They said you were on death's door, but you don't look that bad.
I'd like to be alone.
Hey, I know we aren't exactly best buds, but... What's this? You been crying?
A Guardian $male:Priest,female:Priestess$, sobbing like a baby? Not a good look, friend.
What did you think was gonna happen out there, anyway? You've never had to struggle to survive in your life.
You want my advice?
Forget war. Stay here and live a nice, quiet little life.
Anyway, your sad sack face is bumming me out. You need some fresh air.
I hear there's a lot going on in $map:02000062$ these days, what with the preparations for the empress's shindig.
Yeah. Maybe you're right. I could use some fresh air...
The sea breeze would do me good...
$npcName:11003398$! What happened? Are you okay?
Sergeant! $npcName:11003399$ is hurt. We need to get him to the infirmary.
Squire $MyPCName$, you didn't carry him all the way here... did you?
Yes, Sir! He collapsed while we were running, so I—

Sir, I couldn't just leave him there.
On the field of battle, a knight has greater priorities!
I suppose you think you've helped $npcName:11003399$.
However, now he'll never know if he could have pushed himself to make it on his own.
With all due respect, Sir, I can't just turn a blind eye when my allies are in pain.
Don't talk back to me. A hundred laps around the yard. Go!
What an idiot. Serves $male:him,female:her$ right.
I was getting real sick of $male:his,female:her$ holier-than-thou attitude.
To think they let a commoner like $male:him,female:her$ become a squire...
Sir, I didn't mean...
Are you disobeying a direct order?

One... hundred...
$npcName:11003399$? Sir, what is the meaning of this?
$MyPCName$... It's okay...
Squire $npcName:11003399$ is being punished for failing to complete basic training.
But he's...

<FONT color='#909090'>(At this rate, $npcName:11003399$ won't last the night. But what can you do about it?)</FONT>
<FONT color='#909090'>(You may be powerless to help, but you know someone who isn't. Seek out the garrison priest.)</FONT>
This is him, Brother.

But if one of my comrades—no, if anyone needs my help, then I have to help them!
$MyPCName$...
Huh?! $npcName:11003399$!
$npcName:11003399$! Please, Brother, you have to help him!
Y-yeah. Just... just give me a moment...

Return to your quarters this instant!
I'm sorry, Sir, but I can't do that. Not until I'm certain $npcName:11003399$ is okay.

Haha, sure, it's no skin off my nose. But still...

Very well. Priest, if you'd be so kind.
Sure, sure! But, um, about that... You see, if I heal him right here, my spell might... go sideways and... be bad.
I suggest we move him to the infirmary first. Yeah, that's the ticket!
I'll just, um, let the other priests know we're coming...
Understood. I leave him in your care. $MyPCName$, follow me.
What is this place...?
This is the $map:52000143$. The last place a squire sees before becoming a knight.
But why bring me here?
$MyPCName$, you have a virtuous heart.
But good intentions aren't enough. You must consider the consequences.
The world isn't so simple or easy.
Allow me to demonstrate what it is to be a real knight.
My final test... I'll do my best, Sir!
Good. Come at me!
That's enough.
Captain! What are you doing here?
I was on my way to meet $npcName:11003190$ about some incident at the $map:52000115$.
But I heard the sound of fighting, so I thought I might observe.
I trust your judgment, $npcName:11003401$, but I believe our friend here deserves a chance.
Captain! If $male:he,female:she$ continues unchecked with this inflated sense of pride, $male:he,female:she$'ll die a dog's death out on the battlefield.
I see you haven't gotten over that incident... And yes, you're right.
But shouldn't we all strive to have such a keen sense of justice?
Furthermore, if $male:he,female:she$ can hold $male:his,female:her$ own against you, then it's clear $male:he,female:she$'s ready to advance.
Captain...
You may be inexperienced, squire, but you've already demonstrated a knight's greatest virtue.
The will to protect others.
As long as you hold onto that will, then I believe you can become a great knight. What do you say?
Me... A knight...
It's settled, then! As your captain, I command you to always act for good. Be ready to sacrifice yourself and speak only truth.
Defend the weak. Fear no foe. From this day forward, that is your creed.
I hereby dub thee a Knight of $map:02000001$.
A little later...
Yessir! I'll do my best, even risk my life if you give me a chance!
Sir, you called?
Yes. I've got a mission for you. It comes from the captain.
It seems he has great expectations... I'm still not convinced that you're cut out to be a knight, of course.
The captain may have chosen you, but don't think for one moment that you're special.
I understand. I'll do my best not to let you down.
See to it that you don't. Now, as for your first mission...
You are to escort a caravan of goods back to the palace. It shouldn't be too difficult.
The shipment should be arriving from $map:63000001$ soon. Report to the $map:52000116$ in $map:02000062$ for the full details.
My first mission, at last! I'll make you proud!
Keep your enthusiasm to yourself. This is real work, not some $male:schoolboy,female:schoolgirl$'s adventure.
Do not tarnish the honor of our order!
Yes, sir! You can count on me!
But sometimes... They're hard footsteps to follow...
$npcName:11003189$, it's time to wake up!
Zzz...
Nothing... He's lucky I'm not the captain!
It looks like I have to clean this place up myself. Again.
Zzz...
$npcName:11003189$... Wake up.
The captain...
I told you, don't sweat $npcName:11003380$. We got at least half an hour before she shows up...
Brother.
Huh?!
I've been up for hours, really! I was just lying down after cleaning the whole place up by myself.
Brother, do you know what I despise most?
Uh... wrinkles?
Lies.
I told you, in person, that today's chores were your responsibility.
So why is $MyPCName$ doing your work?
I'm telling you, I did it all myself!
Brother, are you trying to make me angry?
...I'll do better from now on.
See to it that you do. Now, then...
Some of the townsfolk were attacked by animals in the $map:52000146$. I want you to look into it.
I can count on you... can't I?
The $map:52000146$ is a good hike. Isn't there some other job you could give me?
Well, it's been a long time since I've put someone through my special Green Hood training regimen. You could spend the day doing that.
$MyPCName$, let's go! The forest won't patrol itself!
Uh... Okay!
What good are you to me if you can't keep watch properly?
I can't believe I fought a ferocious beast just to save you.
I mean, fighting beasts is part of the job description...
What's that, punk?
Nothing! Next time, I'll... Huh? What's with those $npcNamePlural:29000302$?
They're just $npcNamePlural:29000302$. What's the big deal?
I've never seen so many in one place.
Yeah, that is pretty weird. Anyway, let's get this over with. I could use a nap.
Those were no ordinary $npcNamePlural:29000302$. We'd better tell the captain about this.
Those monsters... It can't be...
It can't be what?
It's nothing. What were you saying?
Let's get back to $map:02000076$ and make our report.
Great idea! Listen, I've got to hit the little elf's room. You go on ahead.
$npcName:11003189$? Wait, $npcName:11003189$!
Several hours later...
What's taking him so long? $npcName:11003380$ will be mad if I come back alone.
I'd better go find him...
How far did $npcName:11003189$ go?
With this, our loved ones will be saved... But it seems you have a guest.
$npcName:11003189$! I've been looking all over for you!
$MyPCName$?! I told you to get back to town!
Is this one of your compatriots? I fear we'll have to eliminate $male:him,female:her$.
What? Why?!
I cannot allow anything to jeopardize the $npcName:11001811$'s plan.
It's best we don't leave any loose ends.
I don't know who you are, shady guy, but me and $npcName:11003189$ won't let you get away with it!
$MyPCName$! Why don't we listen to what he has to say?
Your loyalty is admirable, but this situation cannot be resolved with words.
The witness must be... dealt with.
Fine! But if it has to be done, I'm doing it with my own hands. I owe $male:him,female:her$ that much.
Yes, this is fitting. I shall observe.
$npcName:11003189$, what are you talking about...?
I'm sorry, but there's something I've got to do. I can't let anyone stand in my way... Not even you!
I'm sorry.
Are you done? There's still much work to do before the empress's court.
It's done! If you don't keep your end of the bargain...
You have no reason to mistrust me. Come, see for yourself...
This way.
Bronze Eagle, I leave $MyPCName$ in your care...
A few days later...
I'm... home?
$MyPCName$! You're awake!
Captain...? What happened...?
I don't know. Bronze Eagle brought you back to town.
You were critically hurt. Luckily, whoever did this didn't hit anything vital...
$npcName:11003189$... What about $npcName:11003189$?
I haven't seen him since you two left on your mission.
Was he involved in this somehow?
<FONT color='#909090'>($npcName:11003189$ betrayed you, but he also spared your life... Something strange is going on here.)</font>
<FONT color='#909090'>(Nobody will understand if you tell them what happened...)</font>
$MyPCName$?
While we were scouting, we met a powerful enemy. A stranger in a mask...
I was hurt in the fight, so $npcName:11003189$ had to handle him alone...
A stranger in a mask? I've never heard of such a thing in our woods...
My brother can hold his own in a fight. But surely he would have contacted us by now...
For all the grief he gives me, he's the only family I have. We need to form a search party.
Wait, captain!
We don't know if the stranger was working with anyone else. The Green Hoods need to stay put and keep the town safe.
Leave it to me. I'll find $npcName:11003189$ and bring him back.
I appreciate the statement, but you're in no shape to go out on your own.
It's my fault that he had to fight alone in the first place. I have to be the one to find him!
...Very well. Let me know what I can do to help.
And be careful. Your injuries are still healing.
Thanks, captain.
I'll leave you to your rest.
Bronze Eagle...
The stranger in the mask mentioned the empress's court. I need to get involved somehow. A caravan, perhaps...?
Several days later...
He looks as if he could wake up at any moment, but he's been this way for days now.
I'm searching for a way to awaken him, but I can't let anyone know what I'm doing.
It hasn't exactly been easy...
Who told you to take out the fire...
The ember... Revive the ember...
We have... the light... it shows which way he went...
Ooh... The glorious path of the Scion of Light...
Ah... I'm tired...
We're doomed!
Who is that?
Tsk!
Tada! I wasn't late, was I?
Who's that handsome guy standing outside? He's totally $npcName:11001298$'s type...
$npcName:11001288$... You're $npcName:11001288$! Right?
Hmm? Yes! I'm $npcName:11001288$. Who're you, lady?
Ah... I guess I look like an old woman to you...
Either way, I'm really glad to meet you and I'm relieved that you're safe. I'm $npcName:11001478$, the empress who protects Maple World.
Ah! The empress that's been looking for me...?
Ah! Sorry for being so casual before. Please forget that I ever talked like that.
But why were you looking for me?
$npcName:11001288$! Listen closely to what I'm about to tell you.
Wh-what are you saying?!
Mother... What about mother...?!
I'm going back. I'm going back to Drachenheim right this instant!
You all made it safely! Did you find the lumenstone?
We did. What about Mika...?
She's weak, but now that the lumenstone has been found, she'll recover in time. Did you discover who moved the lumenstone to Lubelisk?
It was $npcName:11003053$... He was the one leading Kargon, the one who betrayed the lumarigons! He was trying to transform the lumenstone's light into darkness!
We weren't able to capture him. We almost had him... but he disappeared!
I'm sure he'll resurface sooner or later... Before he does, $npcName:11001288$ will have to recover her original form as a lumarigon, full of light.
I knew it. I was no match for Vasara Chen...
Hey, who're you? Another Blackstar goon?! I'm not really up for another fight...
But I've got to protect my friends!
Come.
I've been waiting.
Huh...? She can't see.
You're here! I've been waiting for so long! Did you find the goods?
$npcName:11001258$ is waiting. Hurry and get them to her!
Mommy... Mommy...
$npcName:11001288$... You must have felt your mom's presence...
I will collect my mother's memories no matter what!
I'll close this area off while you search for the memory fragments. The one who's read my memories may come looking.
Oof... Didn't quite stick that landing. Now where did—my necklace! That jerk stole my necklace!
That's enough out of you. You are of no use to me without the Lumenstone.
I've had enough of that nova's meddling in Master $npcName:11001813$'s affairs.
Street rats... I'll return you to the gutter, where you belong.
The plan should be underway by now. It was fun, but I don't have time to toy with you.
You should be grateful. I won't show you mercy if we meet again.
Big words coming from someone who's running away! At least $npcName:11001288$ is safe.
She's in shock. Let's get her to the shop so she can get some rest.
Sorry I doubted you before, $MyPCName$. You really pulled through for us. Thanks.
So... we've found the map but... it's ripped. What do we do?
This hero found the ripped pieces of the map. Let's see... how about we take a look and try to piece it together?
I'll... I'll do it!
Like this... Wait...?
Just give it here!
It's the Nazkar Main Hall! The entrance of the Lubelisk! Let's go! We have to find the lumenstone!
$npcName:11001295$! Hurry!
Wooooah... Wait for me!
The moment the lumenstone leaves the Lubelisk, the Sanctum of Light will disappear into darkness once more.
Once you find the lumenstone, come to the Karkar Embassy. I'll be waiting with Mika.
Ha! Here you are! Did you really think you wouldn't get caught?
I told you, no one escapes Alikar... You think you're both so brave?
I'll drag you back to Alikar first, then we'll discuss your crimes!
That could have been dangerous. Thanks.
Whew... That scared the crap out of me.
Sheesh... That could have been bad.
Hey, he succeeded!
$npcName:11001298$ has a keen eye when it comes to people.
What? Who's that?
Someone who's journeyed all the way from Victoria Island to find you.
$npcName:11001288$ has something to tell you, so I'm going to test them to see if they can be trusted.
Ah, I don't know! I don't know what you're talking about. I'm hungry. Let's eat and talk.
$npcName:11001288$... You... You just had a snack...
Yeah, a snack... I need a meal! I want to eat your omelet. Let's go!
Haaa... Maybe it's because you're a lumarigon... Your food cravings are...
Hey, you, friend! You should come to our restaurant, too. Let's talk more there.
Ah, you're here.
Huh? It's that guy from before. Ah, whatever. I'm hungry.
$npcName:11001292$! Omelet! Go, go!
All right, all right!
What are you doing? Hurry on up here!
Hey! Look!
$npcName:11001288$! Over there, too!
Over there!! Look!
The last one is over there!
All the fragments of light have been found!
I can feel the power of light... I think I can open a path! Let's get back to the Sanctum of Light!
Empress! $npcName:11001288$ found them all. The sacred stones of lumarigon.
Thank you everyone. $npcName:11001288$... Do you feel something?
I... I think I'm ready.
Everyone... thank you so much. Thank you for leading me here.
$npcName:11001288$... I hope that the dracheheim and lumarigon can find their places once again...
Yes... I'll be sure to return with a joyous smile. I have to go now...
Nom, nom, nom... Delicious. Better order another one once I finish this.
Exactly how many more dishes am I going to have to make...? And why are you the only guest?
I brought a flyer! If I bring 5 thousand mesos, I can eat as much as I want, right?
I brought a flyer! I can eat as many $npcName:11001292$ omelets as I want, right?
The restaurant lights stayed on throughout the night...
And everyone had a great time filling their bellies with delicious food.
- End -

Perion's true masters have returned.
Help me...

You've gotta be kidding me.
Who is it now?
Warriors of Perion

The Vayar should be here by now!
These weaklings want a piece of the champion? What a waste of my time!
Hmph. It seems more pests have arrived.
I shall retreat... for now. But I will return for the Dark Lapenta Fragment, and then there will be a reckoning!

Excuse me.
Whoa! Where'd you come from? Were you here the whole time?
It looks like $male:he's,female:she's$ an outsider.
$npc:11000076$ sent me.
Somebody's going after the Seven Heroes. $npcName:29000250$ and $npcName:11001573$ have already been attacked. I'm here to help keep $npcName:11000134$ safe!
What is $male:he,female:she$ jabbering about? $npc:11003391$, why don't you take care of $male:him,female:her$?

Hey, $npc:11003391$! What're you mumbling about?
L-let's get back to town.
Sure, sure. Hey, you! Follow us.
Use the portal to move to $map:02000051$

What happened...?
Where is the Dark Lapenta Shard...?
You again? It seems I can't escape you, no matter where I go.

You'll never take Perion!
It's time to end this. I'm sure you're as sick of me as I am of you.
This will be our final meeting!
Defeat $npc:22000326$
Witness the true strength of the Inakimo!
Ugh... This is impossible...
I lost...? Have I not recovered my full power...?
I don't know what you are talking about, but you've lost.
You and the Inakimo will never rule Perion.
Heheheh... You fool... You did not defeat me. I was tricked!
And you will be next. A venomous serpent is after Perion.
The evil of the Inakimo knows no end...
<font size='40'>He vanished?!</font>
What did he say about a serpent?
I'd better get back to $map:02000051$, and fast!
Inside the Melting Hourglass

Where am I?
Is this the inside of the hourglass?
Did $npcName:11000134$ and $npcName:11000009$ also fall down here...?
Ugh... Dad! Wake up!!
I hear a voice! It might be $npcName:11000009$.
Find $npcName:11000009$

<font size='50'>Aaaaaagh!!</font>

War Chief of $map:02000051$

The enemies of the Inakimo must perish.

Defeat $npc:22000324$!

$npcPlural:21000994$! Put an end to our meddling visitor!

$npc:11003392$! Heed my command!

$npcName:11003392$, fight it!

My business here is done. All that remains is the Dark Lapenta Shard.
Bear witness to the end of the Murpagoth, and the crowning of $map:02000051$'s first king!
<font size='40'>Stop right there!</font>
This is bad! I need to warn the others.
$npc:11003391$! Are you okay?
<font size='20'>I thought if I'd finally get the respect I deserve...</font>

That was a close call. Are you hurt?
<font size='20'>How much did $male:he,female:she$ hear? Does $male:he,female:she$ know what I am?</font>

I wonder where $npc:11003431$ went...
<font size='20'>I can't allow it...!</font>

Warn them about what?
You know, about the–
You're gonna tell them I'm Inakimo. You're gonna get me exiled!
Uh... What?
I won't let you ruin my life!
Defeat $npc:11003391$
Ugh... Beaten... by an outsider...
Why do you care so much about being the strongest?
If I'm strong, the others won't look down on me. They'll have to accept me...
You... are an idiot.
Who're you calling an idiot?!
Look, I may be an outsider, but it's obvious that everyone in $map:02000051$ loves you.
Shut up! I don't want your pity. You don't know anything...
I've always been different. That's why I've gotta prove I can carry my own weight...
But the harder I tried, the more the others treated me like a burden... Maybe it's because I really am an Inakimo...
<font size='40'>Enough whining!</font>
This... this is my life, you twerp!
$map:02000051$ is in danger! If you want the others to respect you... If you want to be the greatest warrior...
Then stop whining and help me save $map:02000051$!
If you'd rather sit here and make excuses, instead... then it's no wonder nobody takes you seriously.
You...!
I'm going back to $map:02000051$. Follow me if you want. I don't care!
Ugh...
How much more do I gotta take...?
If I go back to $map:02000051$ now, nothing will change.
They ignore me... They mock me...
I just want to be accepted by them.
That's all I ever wanted...
But they'll abandon me just because I'm Inakimo?
Poor Evagor...
This is no place for you.
Who's there?!
I am the one who will lead you to your destiny.
Don't you want to be Perion's greatest warrior?
Later, at the Shadow Gate...
$npc:11003390$'s Great Hall
Feeling better, Buddy?
Shut up.
For $npcName:29000250$ and $npcName:11001573$ to meet such fates...
Before you arrived, a mysterious army attacked $map:02000051$. I have no doubt that it's the same army you described.
The war chief cannot be allowed to face this danger unprepared.
However...
$map:02000051$ is nearly defenseless right now. If we send our remaining warriors after the chief, then we'll be an easy target.
They can protect $map:02000051$. I'll go look for $npcName:11000134$.
You would do this for us, even when you owe nothing to our tribe?
I'm fighting for a better Maple World for everyone, no matter where they're from!
Thank you, $MyPCName$.
What? How can you trust a big job like this to an outsider?!
I'm the guy you oughta send to save the war chief!
The war chief asked you to defend $map:02000051$ from further attacks. Nothing more.
But—
$npc:11003391$, you are needed in the $map:52010029$. You will find out why the Vayar have failed in their duties to protect our people.
Put any thoughts of pursuing the war chief out of your mind.
I'm sick of this! You oughta treat the town's strongest warrior with more respect!
Let's see how far you get without my help.
$npc:11003391$! Don't be like this!
Leave him. $npc:11003391$ must learn that he is the one who is holding himself back.
$npc:11003388$, inform $npc:11000078$ of the situation. It appears we'll need his help.
Got it.
It worked! Now $npc:11003389$ will have to make me a real doctor!
I asked you so nicely... But, in the end, you subjected my patients to your "treatments."
Medicine Woman of $map:02000051$
I know you're just trying to help people, but an untested treatment can do more harm than good.
Fortunately, it seems our patients are on their way to a full recovery. Just be more careful next time, please.
Yes ma'am...
And you must be $MyPCName$. I've heard of you.
$npc:11003389$, I presume?
A pleasure. But please, let's find somewhere more comfortable to chat.
I will begin the ritual.
I'll help, too!
I'm certain this will cure the war chief.
$npcName:11000134$, heed my call... The holy light compels you!
Awaken!
Ugh... $npcName:11000039$... Is that you?
War chief! You're awake!
<font size='40'>Huh...!</font>
Wait...
It didn't work?!
The ritual was perfect! But the dark aura returned... and the war chief...
Don't worry. We'll find another way.
I hope you're right.
Ugh...
Where am I...?
$MyPCName$! You're awake!
Man oh man, I was sure you were done for...
That dragon did a number on you back at the $map:63000041$.
I think I'm okay now.
What did I miss?

Okay!

Ah, you've regained consciousness. Can you walk on your own?
Hmm. Your magic feels unstable... Well, at least you can travel.
We must return to $map:63000012$. Do you remember the way?
We should hurry. Terrun Calibre hasn't issued a draft in our lifetime...
But the crisis at hand warrants it.
$npcName:11001230$ has temporarily taken on the role of Elder Blade.
Whatever happens next, you must be strong.
This bridge is old and rotted... I'll cross over first to make sure it's safe. You can follow as soon as I'm across.
Well, are you coming?
You ought to be more careful. Are you all right? See if you can find another way up.
Stop splashing around and get up here. I'm going on ahead.
You have your task and I have mine. I'll see you again soon.
It takes a lot of guts to barge into Blackstar's stronghold alone. It seems you're as fearless as your namesake.
My men say you're looking for some folks. I wonder if you've considered how your recklessness might affect these people?
Hahaha... All right, let's have a chat, you and me.
The truth is, I admire people like you who are so full of spirit... A $male:man,female:woman$ on a mission.
Sadly, I can't just let you waltz out of here. Hmm... what to do?
Boss, what are you waiting for?
Just give the order!
Say the word and I'll ice $male:him,female:her$!
Idiots... Enough. You really think you're a match for our friend here? I'll be the judge of that.
So you're the Gray Wolf I've heard so much about. Quite a number you've done on our little hideout.
The Boss wants me to show you the way to $map:63000020$... I hear you'll be going up against the Champ.
This corridor will get us halfway there.
There's an elevator at the end that goes to an underground passage leading to the arena.
With all the hubbub, I expected you to be some kind of three-eyed monster.
You're not at all what I imagined. Well, follow me.
Did you really do all this?
It's hard to believe.
You must be extremely strong.
But $map:63000020$'s champion is something else entirely...
More monster than man.
I wonder if you could really beat him?
I'll see about getting you an escort through the underground passage. Just a moment.
It's me. I'm sending our friend down to you now. You are to escort them to the arena.
Your fight with the Champ will take place after today's tournament concludes.
Now, I'd best be off. I have important matters to attend to.
Here... Just in case things go badly in the ring. These herbs have healing properties.
Although, I'm not sure someone as strong as you will need them...
I look forward to seeing whether the rumors about you are true.
The Gray Wolf is really here?
Yeah, and $male:his,female:her$ skills are no joke!
Hm... Still, there's no way $male:he,female:she$ takes down the Champ.
I dunno man, this time, it could be really close...
Hey, hey! If you're not going to buy anything, go chitchat somewhere else!
It's $male:him,female:her$! The Gray Wolf...
Damn mutt...
I'll destroy you all with my nunchaku skills!
Hehehe... You won't act so tough once you've had a taste of my cudgel!
You think I'm afraid of that little stick? Hahaha!
...Somebody's begging for a beatdown.
Do you think any of those guys have a shot at winning this?
Hahaha.. Are you kidding me?
I heard the Champ is basically a monster.
Hmph! I'll be the new Champ after today!
Did you see the odds for today's match?
I'm thinking of betting on myself and walking out of here a rich woman.
Oh, quit it. He'll pulverize you.
Tch. Maybe somebody'll be willing to take a dive.
Well, shall we get on with the match then?
Ready when you are.
Heheheh... It should be quite a show. All right, Gray Wolf. Let's see what you've got.
Ladies and gentlemen, we have a special treat for you tonight—a surprise battle for the $map:63000020$ championship!
The rules are simple! Contenders will battle through three rounds of qualifiers. The last one standing earns the right to take on the reigning champion!
Introducing our first fighter, the gigantic, roguish... Sylva!
And their challenger, Kerning City's lonely beast! Graaaaay Wolf!!
Amazing! Our next contender is one foul fowl who never quacks under pressure... the immortal $npc:29000101$!
And their challenger, Kerning City's lonely beast! Graaaaay Wolf!!
Unbelievable! It was over in a flash! But our next contestant's no pushover. Here to crush his foes with lightning-fast nunchaku, it's $npc:29000102$!
And their challenger, Kerning City's lonely beast! Graaaaay Wolf!!
Astounding! The ravenous Gray Wolf has torn through all $male:his,female:her$ foes in the blink of an eye! But that was only a warm-up, folks. It's time for the main event!
....Huh? What's going on? My head feels all wobbly...
Am I imagining things? The dizziness seems to have passed.
Slavering for the $map:63000020$ champion's belt, a wild beast has emerged from the shadows! The vigilante who took on 100 Blackstar gangsters and sent them all to the emergency room...
Off to a riotous start in their $map:63000020$ debut, it's the hero of Woodward, the scourge of the streets, the one, the only, the Graaaaay Wooolf!
And here to defend his title tonight is a very familiar face. With an unassailable record of 47 wins, one tie and ZERO losses, it's the reigning champion of $map:63000020$!
Presenting the invulnerable Titanium Fist, the Reaper of the Ring, our undefeated hero. You know him, you love him, it's Vasara Chen!
Ladies and gents the battle of a lifetime is about to begin! ARE... YOU... READY?!
It's about time. Let's see if you're as tough as they say.
All right, Gray Wolf... Show me what you've got.
What happened to that determination I sensed in you? That fire...? What a disappointment...
Unless they... Hmph. How unnecessary...
Sigh... Good night, Gray Wolf.
When's this $male:guy,female:lady$ gonna wake up? I ain't got all day.
You blockhead. Can't you see $male:he's,female:she's$ awake?
What? Really? It's about time. Though I'm honestly surprised $male:he,female:she$ woke up at all.
That's quite enough.
Sorry, Miss. This meathead's a real talker.
What'd you say you scrawny little weirdo?
Shut yer yap and show some respect in front of the chairwoman.
Leave. Now.
S-sure thing, Miss!
Hmph!
$npcName:11003125$ you idiot, you're gonna get us in trouble.
Keep talking and I'll knock that tiny head off your body.
...Sigh. The things I put up with.
How are you feeling, Gray Wolf? Do you know where you are?
<font color="#909090">(Crackle)</font> It's me. Yes, $male:he's,female:she's$ awake. <font color="#909090">(Crackle)</font> I was just about to send $male:him,female:her$ your way.
<font color="#909090">(Crackle)</font> ...Understood.
As expected, the boss has called you to the VIP showroom. It's best you hurry along.
It seems you're finally back with us. Would you care for another drink?
I was looking forward to a more violent brawl... But still, it's been a while since we've had such an entertaining fight.
What's with the sour face? Are you angry that you lost to Vasara Chen? Don't be. He's simply out of your league.
—You got all that? We can't let the Gray Wolf out of our sights or the boss'll have our heads.
Who do you think you're lecturing? Any more of your arrogant whining and I'll knock you on your butt.
Are you kidding me? Your idiocy is the reason we keep getting called out. If you don't want to hear it, then get your act together.
And by the way, you wouldn't last three seconds in the ring with me. Boss paired us up so I could babysit you.
What'd you say you beardy little weirdo?!
Hey, words hurt, Elizabeth!
You promised you wouldn't call me that!
Hey, you started it! And it's your name ain't it? I think I'll call you by your full name from now on!
HAHAHA! $npcName:11000708$! You look like a bear, but you've got a name like a snot-nosed little rich girl.
Grrr... At least I don't look like some ugly little creep!
You look like somebody who hangs out in an alley selling ladies' undergarments!
Oh yeah? You want a piece of me?!
Oh yeah? You want a piece of me?!
Of all the people to be paired with, I'm stuck with these children... At least I won't have to suffer alone, eh Gray Wolf?
Well, I'll leave these idiots to you.
Ah! Finally awake? You fainted again during training, so I brought you here. I'm used to it by now, but honestly... that's not the sort of thing anyone should get used to!
Are you training too hard? There's no need to push yourself so much, you know.
Goodness, you look ready to start right back up again! Such motivation... if I were you, I'd snuggle right back down in those sheets. Mmm...

But if you're already up, I suppose we might as well get ready and go. All of your training equipment is there in the showcase, so why not grab it before I change my mind and steal that cozy bed of yours?
Brother $npc:11001720$ will grill us again if we're late, so let's hurry!
So much for proper training. Do you think the path to enlightenment starts after sleeping away half the day?
$MyPCName$. Fainting is a sign that your mind and body are weak. I expect you to train as if your life depends on it. Because one day it will.
Brother, have some compassion. This kind of stress is the last thing $MyPCName$ needs now.
You're in no position to say that, Tinchai. Left on your own, you never would have left your room today. I expect twice the effort from you to make up for it!
Whaa-at? Gah, why did I say anything...
Get to it! The pillars await in the pond.
You look tired already. Enough talk of new skills, you need to strengthen your fundamentals.
For your next exercise, I want you to...
...to what? Wait, is something wrong?
I don't know. My barrier charm is buzzing.
That means someone is tampering with the barrier stones!
It's possible, or it could be another problem. Regardless, we must investigate. $npc:11001656$, follow me.
Really? I thought you were going to check...
The barrier stones are scattered all over Halo Mountain, you layabout! Checking every stone would take me all day!
...should've just made charms for each stone, then.
$npc:11001656$, let's hurry!
Hmm... I have a bad feeling about this...
Do I really need to tag along for this? I need my rest...
You need to shape up! Now, let's go!
Follow us to the South Lotus Glade. It's just through the pass here.
Hah... Oh good, you're still here. Something's wrong, we need to get to Crescent Moon Cave right away...
There! It's them!
Oh, no! Come on, we can't let them get to the cave!
$MyPCName$? Are you coming? I need your...
No, NO! Wake up! We need to get to the cave before... Oh, why now?
$MyPCName$!
Where... am... I?
...In the end, we found ourselves here. Hardly ideal...
...I did predict this. It was only a matter of time. They would come, for we could not keep them blind forever...
It isn't time...
Just stay alive... For now...
All of this... is for...
Was that... a dream?
Huh... hah... $MyPCName$! Are you up? Great, because I could use a hand!
Whew... that was close. $MyPCName$, are you all right?
...Oh, you can't be serious.
Junta! JUNTAAA! Where are you, you-
Hiyah! You cannot stand against me!
Oh, thank goodness... Where were you?!
I followed one of those creatures across the mountain, where they ambushed me. It took time to teach them the error of their ways and make my way back.
L-look! They... They're coming again!
$npc:11001656$, $MyPCName$! We're going to find the master. Follow me!
I like that plan! Come on, $MyPCName$, let's go!
Let's go to the master!
That should be enough for now.
Let's go to the master!
Master!
Master!
Halo Mountain is under attack!
Their forces are innumerable!
There's no need for such commotion, I am well aware. Their dark power can be felt all across Halo Mountain.
$MyPCName$, come to me. There is something I must tell you.
Unwelcome guests? I expected a warmer reception!
Ah, that aura...!
Master, is that...?
No, it couldn't be!
Halo Mountain, undefended... Clearly, you never thought I would return. What has it been, $npc:11001556$? 200 years or so?
Kandura. I knew this darkness was your doing.
It has been too long since we trained together. I had hoped that time would be kinder to you.
Trained...? Was he a student of Guidance?
Does it matter now? He's the one threatening Halo Mountain!
He's also not someone to trifle with. I will handle this.
$npc:11001778$, you betrayed Guidance 200 years ago. What business do you have with us now? Is this revenge for not being chosen as Guidance's successor?
Revenge? Ha, how petty you must think me. Your little tree-hugger club means nothing to me. But the divine power of the Munakra is of great interest to me.
So, I'll make this simple. Hand over the source of that power, and you can keep playing pretend heroes up here.
The divine power... Why return for something that was lost centuries ago? You know as well as I, none of us have that power.
And even if we did, we would never hand it to someone so consumed by darkness. Your demands are meaningless here.
Don't play dumb with me. That power is hidden somewhere here. Of that I am certain.
Then I am certain you are a fool. Whether you choose to listen or not, we have no power to give, and no will to cooperate with your evil schemes.
Well, I did give you a choice. It would seem that today marks the end of Guidance's long and storied history.
I will deal with $npc:11001556$. You lot, kill the rest!
You call that a plan, $npc:11001778$?
$npc:11001720$, $npc:11001656$... You must continue our work. Leave, and seek the voice of destiny.
Master, you can't be serious!
We all have our place on the great wheel of fate. And this is mine.
Master!
Enough of this. I'm eager to finish the fight we began 200 years ago.
Listen to me, $npc:11001720$! Take the others and go!
Master! Master!!
N-no, the cave, it's collapsing!
Gah... We've got no choice! Tinchai, $MyPCName$, follow me!
Over here! Hurry!
M...Master was....
Master!!!
Ah, even here...!
They won't stop us!
T-these monsters! Burning our mountain, our home... No, I'll go back and show them all! I'll avenge...
Enough! Would you really defy the master and dishonor his sacrifice?
There's just three of us now! If you go off and get yourself killed, what will become of Guidance? Look at you, you're not even in any condition to fight.
Nonsense! I have all the... Agh!
No more of your bluster. You're a disciple of Guidance, so act like it. You heard what the master said. We all have a place on the great wheel of fate.
Now that the master is gone, the only person who can lead Guidance is you. That is your place, not lying cold on this mountain.
Rrgh...
...I know. Believe me, I know.
...Fine. There is wisdom in your words, $npc:11001656$. I lost myself there... and I apologize. So, what do we do now?
We haven't had a moment to think since those creatures appeared. Now might be a good time to collect ourselves.
$npc:11001656$, we'll follow you to Tria...
But I have no expectation of them helping us.
I know, but it's still our best option right now.
With just the three of us, we need as much support as possible.
We can't dismiss any opportunity yet.
$npc:11001656$! They've found us!
No, it's too soon! Hurry!
You two go on ahead. I will hold them off!
You can't stop them on your own! $MyPCName$, get on the cloud! We'll buy you some time!
$MyPCName$, you fool! Why do you hesitate? Get on the cloud!
$MyPCName$, don't worry about us... The fate of Guidance is in your hands now!
Detecting biometric response to Destiny Wave effect! Shifting scan modes... Code R initializing... Contact! We have full resonance response!
Analyzing source... It's them! The lost child! Calculating location coordinates... M5750, point GE 0-64!
Interesting. They actually managed to survive. And those coordinates... Halo Mountain, is it? I say, it's been so very long now...
Prepare the shadows. I will lead the strike on Halo Mountain myself. I've an old friend there I really should visit... Heh, heh.
$npc:11001778$, sir, all of Guidance's members have escaped. Shall we proceed to phase 4?
$npc:11001556$... You managed to foil my plan after all. But in the end, it hardly matters. Yes, begin phase 4 immediately.
The road shifts, but the destination remains the same. Absolute power will soon be mine!
Who are you? To enter this place so boldly...
I will not let a few pest interfere with such a momentous occasion!
Ugh... Are you alright...?! Argh...
Don't worry... The wound isn't deep... Ugh.
Fool. What a meaningless sacrifice... I'll defeat you too.
Hehehe... Idiot. You are too late!
I'll deal with you later. Sleep!
Haha... It looks like I didn't have to do anything.
Since the interloper is gone... Let's talk. Hehehe...
I was too late... Is it over? It seems that $MyPCName$ has perfectly assimilated the master's energy...
Hehehe... It's over, you say? Only my master can make such a determination.
W-with the power of this godly artifact... Ahaha!
Ah, Gray Wolf! I knew you'd come.
I'm saved! Thank you!
Of course... He's not here either...
Hehe... Enough awkwardness!
Let's go back to our home, where Master is waiting!

Dark Sanctum: Black Moon Abyss Citadel
This is a shameful turn of events, $npcName:11001811$. For my colleague to fail both at Henesys and at Perion...
And where were your Rooks when my soldiers were facing the Vayar?
You were supposed to support us!
My liege, if you want him punished, then I will gladly—
You think you can pin your failures on me?
I followed the $npcName:11001811$'s orders to the letter, you raggedy buffoon.
You, on the other hand, have failed twice now. You don't deserve your rank here.
You're digging your own grave, $npcName:11001815$. Shall I bury you in it?
Cease your bickering.
Heh...
Do you know why I have summoned you here?
If your incompetence continues, our plans in Ellinia are certain to fail.
You have all failed me.
While you fight amongst yourselves, our enemies move against us.
For such an entity to appear in Maple World... It was unexpected...
Who cares about $male:him,female:her$? I'm waaaay better than that stupid bug. I should've squished $male:him,female:her$ when I had the chance!
Leave it to me. I'll wipe $MyPCName$ from the face of Maple World.
That won't be necessary.
But why nooooooot?
You've already had your fun in Kerning City. Now it's time to focus on greater things.
Good point. Kerning City was a ton of fun.
Just you wait. I'm gonna give you the best army! Better than any stinky old devil army. Something totally new!
See to it that you do. But do it quietly. We cannot afford for the empress's pawns to learn our true plans.
Fine, fine. I'll be nice and quiet.
I somehow don't think that "nice and quiet" will be enough.
$npc:11001820$ has made herself into the empire's most wanted criminal. Even those idiots in the guard are bound to stumble upon her lair sooner or later.
You think I can't handle some dummy guards?!
We need a distraction. Something to keep them busy.
And who's going to do that? Even with the $npcName:11001811$'s express summons, we're missing over half of the commanders.
I will.
Ah, the red cape. Are you certain you're up to the task?
I'm the most qualified person for this job.
The royal court and their allies still consider me family.
Their sentimentality will be their undoing.
$MyPCName$...
The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.
It appears the $npcName:11001811$ is busy...
Then again... You sure had a lot of time to prepare your 'magic'... Heh heh heh...
...Turka. How do you know what $npcName:11001811$ is preparing?
I have eyes and ears everywhere...
To think that only the Rooks see and hear all... Such arrogance...
All right, then let me fill you in, you who have eyes and ears everywhere.
I don't know how much you know about the magic that $npcName:11001811$ is preparing, but...
Please blab about it everywhere. That way I have a reason to slice you with my sword.
Hehehe... Are you telling me to watch my mouth?
If a mouth even exists inside those rags.
What an interesting threat... $npcName:11001815$... Did you know? I've heard a lot of interesting things...
Since the $npcName:11001811$ is not here, let me tell your seemingly carefree self a few things...
Thanks to $npcName:11000525$, the Tria royals and the guardian are all focused solely on her...
It's very good news for us...
You can't take the human bonds of family lightly... It is their greatest strength, and their greatest weakness...
$npc:11001815$, you became a commander for your family's sake, did you not?
Say another word, and I'll consider it just cause. So how about it? Care to continue?
The $npcName:11001811$ isn't here, either.
Heh heh heh... Calm down... I just wanted to compliment $npcName:11000525$, that's all...
Thank you, $npcName:11001813$.
The Tria royals don't seem to want to give you up so easily... I wanted to ask you how you felt about that... Heh heh...
It was just a mission. I have no affection for the Red Capes.
Of course, you shouldn't... Especially if you want to be of use...
I've pledged my loyalty entirely to the $npcName:11001811$, $npcName:11001813$.
Take it easy, heh heh. I just thought it'd be fun to hear how you felt...
$npcName:11000525$, if you have nothing to say, get going. I'll report to $npcName:11001811$.
"A false peace created through the sacrifice of innocents..."
Maple World has no future as long as its people believe this fabricated history. That is why I turned my back on everything and became the Red Cape.
But after everything that's happened... Can we be so sure that saving the world is truly the Black Mage's goal?
...There's no turning back for me now.
The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.
Finally... The Innocent of Darkness is within reach.
But too much of our plan was revealed in the process. And now, they're right on our heels. Worst of all, the Innocent of Darkness is beyond our grasp.
Dark Lord, we had no other option. Sacrifices must be made to achieve our goals. We have dealt with such decisions in the past.
But it was because of that choice that the world was able to welcome the existence of $npcName:11001811$, no? ...heh heh
Oooh? $npcName:11001813$, keep acting like that and you'll die.
Just say the command and I'll...
Stop, $npcName:11001815$.
Their words are not completely wrong.
If it weren't for that situation, I might still be blinded by false hope. The false hope that the light will rescue everyone...
A world intoxicated with light will cover up the ugliness of reality and make it beautiful... We are so very familiar with this.
Wait just a little longer, Win... I mean, Dark. Lord. $npcName:11001698$ will completely destroy that world of light!
With $npcName:11000525$ engaging their full attention,my army has been able to prepare without any obstacles!
Never let your guard down.
Argh! I didn't let my guard down! $npcName:11001698$ just...
$npcName:11001698$, I gave you the most important mission, didn't I?
I will need you when the time is most critical. Until then, don't make any mistakes.
Sorry to ask... Heh heh... But was $npcName:11001698$'s mission really that important...?
The four Commanders who aren't here are all out on missions, but it seems as though $npc:11001698$'s is the only mission the $npcName:11001811$ considers important.
Conspiracy theorist $npcName:11001813$. That should be your new title.
I gave you the job of spreading disbelief, jealousy, and envy throughout Maple World. And you've been doing a fantastic job of it.
That's the reason you're the owner of Conspiracy within the 7 Commanders.
$npc:11001698$, what's your Commander name?
$npc:11001698$ the Raging!
The first step to shed the world of light... is to expose the rage of darkness to the source of light.
It'd be good for the one who deals the blow to be someone that "died" because of the light.
With the its name and its mission... Doesn't $npcName:11001698$ seem perfectly suited for the role?
...Heh heh heh... True... $npcName:11001811$...
$npc:11001698$'s army needs more time to complete their preparations. But with most of the commanders busy attending to other assignments, we're short on manpower.
I think it's still too soon...
What about the actions of $npcName:11000525$?
$npc:11000525$ has been moving a lot lately. There's a risk of her being tracked while trying to divert attention.
The board is set. The time has come to choose your knight.
I think it's time we find some new bait... Some extremely fresh new bait...
I have an excellent plan, $npcName:11001811$... Trust this task to I, Conspirator $npcName:11001813$, heh heh.
$npcName:11001815$ and the Rooks are unable to take action due to the Black Moon, not to mention the Blood Red Lion in Elnas Fortress...
$npc:11001813$, I'll leave it to you.
$npcName:11001811$! $npcName:11001813$ cannot be trusted. Why not select Gray Leopard instead? Although he was only just appointed a commander, his loyalty is...
$npcName:11001813$ will try to justify his name within the 7 Commanders, $npcName:11001815$. Just focus on your mission.
Yes, $npcName:11001811$...
So, $npc:11001813$... How exactly will you draw their attention?
I'm not going to spoil it before the fun has even begun, but I've got my eyes on a few... pawns. Oh yes, one this is certain: $npcName:11001815$ will really enjoy this... heh heh...
It's time to start using them...
Follow the mysterious man!
Follow the mysterious man!
Follow the mysterious man!
Follow the mysterious man!
Follow the mysterious man!
Follow the mysterious man!
Follow the mysterious man!
