I... I can't move...
Where... where is the $npcName:11001815$?
$npcName:11000044$, I'm hurt. Weren't you to contact me, first?
$npcName:11001813$! I never should have trusted you, you raggedy windbag!
If the $npcName:11001815$ were here... he'd put you in your place...
$npcName:11001815$, $npcName:11001815$, $npcName:11001815$. Do I hear an echo in here?
Where is your $npcName:11001815$ now, hm? Where was he when the empire's hounds started closing in on you?
Silence, fool! He and the Rooks have a greater purpose... The Black Moon...
And this so-called "Black Moon" is more important than your life, is it? How cruel.
Don't mock them simply because you have no sense of duty...
Perhaps not. But what of your duty, $npcName:11003200$?
Th-that's...
You swore to protect $npcName:11000523$, did you not? Sold your soul to carry out this duty of love. To guard her...
...from the light of destruction.
You lie before me, broken. How will you protect your precious $npcName:11000069$ like this? How will you save her world?
You placed your trust in the $npcName:11001815$, but he never cared about your "duty."
Shut up!
He put you at the head of Dark Wind and turned you into his puppet.
If he actually cared about you, wouldn't he have rescued you by now?
Poor, pathetic $npcName:11003200$...
I'm sure the $npcName:11001815$... He had...
Stop making excuses. If you want to change your destiny, I have a gift for you...
What...?
This shadow seed will grant you the power of the $npcName:11001811$.
You will become the scion of the darkness itself.
The $npcName:11001815$ has abandoned you. But with this strength, you won't need him ever again.
Accept this gift... and save $npcName:11000523$ with your own hands!
Save $npcName:11000523$... with my own hands...
Warning. Multiple unidentified life forms detected. Inbound towards Kerning City.
Surveillance team, report!
It's our early response radar system, Sir. It's detecting a level 3... no, a level 2 security breach!
Analyzing life forms now... We should know what we're up against in a moment.
Pattern recognition failed. Category NULL. Cannot proceed with target analysis.
Category... NULL?
Whatever it is, it doesn't want to be identified.
The life forms have broken through the city's perimeter defenses. They're coming from all sides!
Wh-what do we do, Captain? Most of our agents are out searching for $npcName:11000064$!
Calm down. Deploy all available agents into the streets of Kerning City.
Also, as captain of Dark Wind...
I am issuing protocol Black Mushroom.
Black Mushroom... No way...
Yes. Kerning City is about to become a battlefield.
This is a... maple tree?
Huh, that person...? Do they need help?
I'll try talking to them.
$npcName:11001869$! No need to go! I'm here!
Oh, you have a guest! Well, since I'm here, you got anything you need enchanted?
You know that you can enchant from your inventory window, too, right?
Wh-what's going on? The island is shaking!
What happened...?
I-I'm not sure... I wonder what's going on...
Welcome! Is this your first time at our boutique?
There's no need to be shy! Don't feel burdened! Come over here!
Oooh, is that new?
It looks so good on you!
The design... The fit... It's perfect!
Welcome, one and all, to the (unofficial) MapleCar Racing Circuit!
The race will begin soon. Racers, come to the starting line!
Hm... I just don't know...
Anyone want to race in my super car? Anyone? Anyone?!
Are you all ready to race?
On your mark... Get set...
On your mark... Get set...
Wow! You actually finished! I'm amazed!
Stop! Stop right there!
Follow the masked figure!
A trap! Gotta find a way through...
I bet that lever will call another cart.
He dropped something!
The Attack on Kerning City
The situation is grim...
But that's what we have the Black Mushroom protocol for.
The package should be arriving just about now...
Behold, the ultimate weapon. Crafted using advanced Taliskar technology, I present the MK 52 Alpha.
It technically hasn't been cleared for combat use, but these are desperate times.
I'm entrusting you with the MK 52. The survival of Kerning City is in your hands!
There's no time to waste.
Don't let them rally their forces!
Destroy the enemy's portals
Several hours later...
Hurry!
My legs...
Work, work, work...
Stop whining!
Watch out in front!
The damage to the city isn't minimal, but we suffered no casualties thanks to you.
Who were they and why were they targeting Kerning City? These questions are now my top priority.
The MK 52 is scrap... for now. At least it held out through this battle.
In fact, this made an excellent field test for it. And the city is safe, so I'd call that a win.
But that's enough of that. Let's go inside. I have something to ask you.
That should be plenty of combat data for her... and for him.
Nice!
We did it!
Good job!
Now we're on a roll!
Awesome!
Thanks a ton!
Thank you!
We got the portal!
Is that the new weapon?!
Thanks for saving me!
You spineless...
Everyone! Stand your ground!
You'll never make it with that attitude!
Work hard! The Goldus Way!
Put your back into it!
Pinch a penny, make a penny!
What are you doing? Repeat after me!
The Gol-Gol-Gol...
The Goldus Way!
Help!
I'm scared!
Run!
Monsters! Moooonsters!
Huh, what's this?!
...Help!
Aaah!
Help me...!
Thank you so much!
What to do...
Charge! Show them our power!
Is that $npcName:11001698$? I didn't know her army was so strong...
Come on, $npcName:11000523$... We need those reinforcements...
$MyPCName$, we have to buy her as much time as we can!
Soldiers, with me! Hold the line!
We've got wounded soldiers on our flank! $MyPCName$, get them on their feet!
Just hold out a bit longer!
$npc:11003178$, r-reporting for duty!
Oh jeez, look at that. $MyPCName$, you get that guy. I'll get the little ones!
We'll hold the walls. $MyPCName$, go after them!
Please! Protect the empress!
Such carnage...
This wasn't a battle. It was a slaughter.
$MyPCName$! It's you! I haven't seen you since the caravan attack.
There's no time to chat. Joddy... He's hurt! He jumped in front of a fireball to save the rest of us... Fool...
I'll do what I can to help him!
...and the guards who laid down their lives to protect Tria... They were true heroes.
If they hadn't held the line, Tria would have fallen.
We can't let their sacrifices be in vain, can we?
No, we can't. If $npcName:11001698$ is one of these "Seven Commanders," then that means there are six more commanders to worry about.
If we're going to survive, we need to set aside our differences and work together.
In that case, please, lend me your ears.
There are certain... facts about myself and my station that I'm not free to share with you.
$npcName:11001812$, leader of the Seven Heroes, feared these facts and what they meant for the future...
But it is not yet time for those facts to come to light.
Instead, let me offer you a promise. When the time is right, I will tell you everything. I swear it.
Until then, I ask you to trust me.
We face an enemy with the ambition and power to threaten all of Maple World.
To honor the heroes who have fallen and to protect Maple World, we must make a stand.
We must set aside our old feuds and pool our strengths. If you will join in a new alliance with me...
Then I will offer you all of the support I can as empress.
Our war against the darkness begins today.
They broke straight through the walls. Hurry! Before the guards are overwhelmed!
Push through! To the end of the hallway!
Stand firm! We are the last line of defense against the darkness!
$MyPCName$! $npcName:11001236$!
We aren't too late!
Thank you, $MyPCName$, $npcName:11000064$, everyone. Without your courage, Tria would be...
With all due respect, Empress, you should be thanking $npcName:11000523$. If she hadn't warned us, the enemy would have overwhelmed us before we knew they were coming.
You don't think this is over, do you?
That voice...!
I haven't even started to play, and you guys want to pack up for the day? I'm hurt!
You are $npcName:11001698$ of the Seven Commanders. $npcName:11000069$ told me about you.
Oh, that little girl told you about us? I've gotta give it to her. She's got connections!
But I don't care if our secret is out. Starting today, the Seven Commanders are in charge, and you're not!
See, you're a big, bad monster, so we're going to seal you up. It's for the good of Maple World, after all!
Wh-what...? It's... it's the light of destruction...!
Fine, be that way. I'm leaving!
Thought you had this room all figured out, huh?
We saw your Humblis buddies staking out the building. Too bad they didn't know about this entrance!
How'd they get past us? Another secret door?
We'll clean up here. Go report to $npcName:11001822$.
Leave these traitors to us.
You and $npcName:11001236$ are next!
Everyone, stop!
$npcName:11000523$! You're alive!
You all need to stop fighting and just listen to me.
There's so much we didn't know. Let $npcName:11000044$ explain. Please!
Have you lost your mind? $npcName:11000044$ is the enemy! He killed your father, and he nearly killed us, too!
I don't know what you said to her, $npcName:11000044$, but you won't fool me!
Are you so afraid of the truth, $npcName:11001236$? Even when it's right in front of you, you refuse to open your eyes.
Little matter. You'll die by my hands no matter what you believe.
I will entrust $npcName:11000523$ with the truth. But you... You will die!
$npcName:11000044$! Please stop! Even if the others don't believe you, I do...
But if we're going to save the world, we all have to work together. Please, $npcName:11000044$... Can't we go back to the way we were?
The three of us... We swore we'd always be able to believe in each other...
$npcName:11000523$... Those days are over...
Tch. Fine...
$npcName:11001236$... $MyPCName$... $npcName:11000523$ has saved your lives.
And the lives of the people of Tria...
Wait... Tria...?
$npcName:11000523$, it is up to you to decide how you'll use what I've told you. But I doubt your allies will believe a thing you say.
To change the future, you have to give up your present.
What... What is going on here?
$npcName:11000523$! What, exactly, did $npcName:11000044$ say to you?
I promise I'll tell you everything. But first, we have more important things to do.
Follow me. There's no time to waste. Thousands of lives are on the line!
Is that what he meant? The people of Tria are in danger?
Yes... Tria. As we speak...
The forces of darkness are marching on Tria!
We need to run! Hurry!
All right, let's go now.
Gee wiz, I didn't think it'd be so spooky out here...
Keep it together.
Oh man... Did you hear something?
I'm counting on you, $MyPCName$...
Huh?
Someone's coming!
Fall back!
Retreat! Retreat!
Hey, that's $npcName:11001968$! What's going on?
$npcName:11003344$? From cadet training? What are you doing here?
What's the big rush?
The rest of you, follow me!
Just ahead... it's a trap! We need to form up and protect the caravan!
There's no time. Help us hold them off!
Uh... Maybe I should fall back with the others...
You haven't changed. What about you, mercenary?
Mercenary...? Oh, me!
You've got to buy us time. Just until the captain gets here.
I'll get the others to safety.
As for you, $npcName:11003344$... Stay out of the way.
What's that shaking?!
W-w-wait for me!
Look at this! Some of the little bugs survived!
I'm getting sick of playing with you pests.
Let's get this over with!
Ack!
What the? That spell should've knocked you out! Boo!
Hm... You aren't like the other little bugs.
Hm... You aren't like the other little bugs.
Here, take this!
Here, take this!
Aw. You weren't so tough, after all.
Aw. You weren't so tough, after all.
But... why do I feel like there's a connection between this little bug and me...?
But... why do I feel like there's a connection between this little bug and me...?
Get outta here, Red Cape. I'm not in the mood!
We've got new orders. It's time to go.
I said I'm not in the mood!
That's too bad. The others are waiting for you.
Ugh... And I was just starting to have fun...
If you're worried about your plaything over there, I'll finish $male:him,female:her$ off for you.
I've already taken care of it. Just open your stupid portal.
Little Luka will take care of you, bug.
I've got to get up...
I can't fall here...
I still have things to do!
Survive Lukarax
I don't remember how the fight ended.
What I do remember...
...is people all around me...
...carrying me to safety.
I woke up on the road to Tria.
We had to get to the capital and report what had happened.
Commander of Rage
Are you awake?
You were the least wounded among those who were attacked crossing the mountain trail... But I was worried the injury might be severe because you took so long to regain consciousness.
Anyway, now that you're awake, I'm relieved. Take some time to recover.
I heard you crossed the dangerous mountain trail for the ceremony... It's been canceled.
Ugh...
Where am I?
The others... Are they safe?
Everyone's safe. Thanks to you.
What a relief...
But... I can't see anything...
Have I gone blind?!
You can't see anything because your eyes are closed.
Oh. Good point.
There we go. I was worried you might have brain damage for a moment there.
It seems you've pulled through, after all.
The Shield of Tria
Where be she, my bonnie lass?
There! The most beautiful fish in the sea!
No more will ye spurn my love! You're comin' with me, one way or t'other!
Ugh. How many times do I have to tell you? I don't date pirates.
Get lost.
Gahh...?!
♬ O magicked waves, reveal my cave! ♬
That oaf will never find me here...
Aaak! Where be my scaly maiden fair?
Find her, or I'll boil the lot of ye!
Who are you?!
$npcName:11003084$! Landwalker, I will not forgive you!
$npcName:11003085$! No! You'll pay for this!
What...?! Ugh...You're tough for a pirate...!
W-who are you...?
$npcName:11000444$ the explorer said you could help me.
$npcName:11000444$...? $npcName:11003084$, I thought I told you not to see that human again!
Oh... I guess you're not a pirate.
I'm really sorry about the misunderstanding.
Sorry, we've had a lot of pirate trouble lately...
$npcName:11003086$, Guardian of the Seas, says the same.
It'd be best if you spoke with him in merson.
Perhaps we can convince him to grant you an audience!
Here, proof that he sent me.
So why have you come here?
$npcName:11000444$ claims this world is on the brink of disaster.
You won the battle!
We did it!
Victory!
What?! Why are you here?
Go away!
I'll get my revenge later!
Wait a moment!
We will help!
The entrance will close in 30 seconds.
Attack Pippy before he gets away!
You need to destroy the turrets to capture the bridge!
Get on the Ballista!
Watch out! They're coming!
Royal Guard combat horses! Avenge the Royal Guards!
We can't let the Maple Alliance steal the show.\nTaliskar will step in now.
MK 52 Omega, landing successful.\nUnion, this is a present from Dr. Kartronic.
Madrakan's Heart
For the alliance army to congregate, we need to take over the bridge!\nLet's move!
Militia, attack!
A secret tunnel? Here? How unexpected.\nWe wouldn't even need to crush the ramparts...
But we won't be able to get many soldiers in through here.
We've got this spot. You go on ahead and infiltrate the fortress.
Grieving Spirit
Grieving Spirit
I sense... a remnant of the past.\nIt's a vision of an old mansion.
...Unexpected guests have arrived...
Well, no matter. I'm sure you're curious about this place as well...
Can you feel it? These powerful evil spirits... It's rare to come across so many spirits. They must carry a strong grudge.
Welcome to the Cursed Mansion. I hope you find the answer you seek...
Evil spirits issue forth from the magic circle in the center of the hall.\nDefeat them to purify the mansion.
I will make this place sparkle!
I'm so happy to work here!
Mistress hates bugs. I need to keep things clean.
Lalala...
Ouch!
Cough, cough...
Ugh...
Nothing seems to be helping...
Cough... cough...
Cough... I think I'm coming down with something...
I hear coughing everywhere...
...Master did not eat today, again.
Our lady is very sick. He must be too worried to eat...
Ha... Huh...
...The fever is not going down... This is bad.
...How is she?!
No... Madria...
Hmm...
Where can I find a good book to read to my daughter...?
Not here...
Hmm...
No... This can't be...!
Master...
Master...
We need to cure her, no matter what!
Can... can we cure this disease...?!
Right now, $npcName:11001812$ is working on his research as best as he can.
Minister...! Please persuade the empress not to abandon her realm!
We can't all die just here...We need to save whatever salvageable land we can.
Dad...?
Let's go back, $npcName:11000525$. Forget this place now.
But... but I made a promise to the lady!
Stop whining. You sound like a baby.
The entrance will be closed in 30 seconds.\nStarting now, the party leader can no longer forfeit the dungeon.
The entrance will close in 30 seconds.
The entrance will close soon.
A powerful source of evil has appeared in the center of the hall.
Still, this power will allow me to become the kaiser. Finally, I will rule over Grandis!
Hello? Anybody here?
Hm... This is definitely the place...
Ungh. Why can't I move...?!
Traipsing so blindly into danger is going to get you killed.
You should turn back now, while you still can.
Wait! I have something to ask you!
Were you the one our expedition encountered?
They were here investigating a weather anomaly.
That is, until they were attacked by someone matching your description.
Why did you attack them? Why are the forces of darkness here?
Your friends were standing in the way of my mission.
There's someone I must eliminate with my own two hands...
I'll show no mercy to anyone who stands in my way.
A powerful blizzard rages beyond.
You should trust your instincts and leave this place.
Someone like you could never survive that deadly cold.
Are you okay?
Your aid is unnecessary. I could have handled things alone.
I think the words you're looking for are "thank you."
She looks hurt... Hey, are you okay?
Uuugh...
Are you all right?
Yes, thanks to you. I don't know what would've happened if you hadn't come...
Is this all of them?
No. Their leader has been manipulating Queen $npcName:11003074$. We have to stop him.
Their leader came here? But why?
After the loss of her kingdom and King $npcName:11003075$, $npcName:11003074$ dwelt here alone in sadness. Until he appeared.

He promised to reunite $npcName:11003074$ with $npcName:11003075$ if she opened the path to the secret shrine. He showed her $npcName:11003075$'s bracelet—a gift from $npcName:11003074$—as proof of his claims.
Eventually, $npcName:11003074$'s sadness became too much for her, and she agreed to take him to the secret shrine on $map:02000381$. Then they left.
I tried to stop him from leaving with her, but his minions were too strong.
Can you describe him to me?
I never saw his face because of that black hood, but... he looked like a ghost.
...Turka.
Wait, are you really going to run off on your own again?
If we're both going after the forces of darkness, we should do it together...
Turka's life is mine to end.
Stay out of my way.
Hurry! We have to hurry and get up the mountain.
$npc:11003074$ is at the shrine hidden at the top of this mountain!
My, my... Uninvited guests.
Unfortunately, I don't have time to give each of our guests a proper greeting. There are matters I must attend.
Wait. I thought the reason you came here was to help me?
Tell me where $npcName:11003075$ is...!
Hehehe... Why do you think I wanted you to bring me here, of all places?
Two things are required to unseal the temple doors...
It can't be...
You finally understand. Your Majesty, you are the final key.
Release the seal and throw open the door to the Frostpillar Temple.
Your beloved companion awaits you there.
$npcName:11003075$ is... inside...?
My queen! You mustn't! If you open the door to the Frostpillar Temple... The Frozen Crystal might explode!
What noisy, unwelcome guests... Hehe.
Your Majesty, if you would be so kind as to dispatch those noisy whelps, I will deal with our newest guest.
Does your treachery know no end?
My, what an unexpected face... Have you come all this way to find me? Ehehehe...
There's nowhere to run. This day will be your last.
Run? Ahahaha... What confidence! All right, I'll play along.
Let's spend a little time together, just you and I. What do you say, disgraced bladesman?
What...?
My Queen, you can't throw away everything for the words of a stranger. Especially while the king remains missing...
But $npcName:11003075$ is who I've come here to find.
Your Majesty!
I'm sorry, but I must see my beloved. If you would stand against me, you leave me no choice!
You would deny me this?
My Queen, you cannot release the temple's seal on the words of a stranger whose motives remain unknown. Let me take you home where you can rest...
I am truly sorry...
Your Majesty...?
What do we now? Have we failed?
This ice was conjured with $npcName:11003074$'s magic... It would take a special potion to melt it...
How long will we be stuck like this?
You fool. Didn't I tell you your self-righteousness would get you killed?
Surmany...!
I appreciate you saving us, but what are you doing here?
I followed you here because of what that $male:guy,female:girl$ said... Dark forces this, end-of-the-world that... I was worried you idiots would hurt yourselves!
It's okay, $MyPCName$. Surmany may act mean, but it's only because he cares about us.
Don't be ridiculous! I just don't want the world ending on my watch.
Thanks, Surmany. And $MyPCName$... Thank you for everything you've done.
Things are looking grim. We should regroup at the outpost and think.
Thank you all for joining me today.
These past fifteen years, we've allowed ourselves to grow apart, and $npc:11001698$ has taken advantage of this fact.
I invite everyone here to come together to form a new Maple Alliance, dedicated to the protection of the light and our people.
That's a beautiful thought, Empress, but we need to face facts.
The enemy's hit all of us, and hit us hard. Even after combining our forces, we're coming up short.
I hate to admit it, but $npcName:11001822$ is right. It's going to take time before my guards are back up to full strength.
We can't just sit here and do nothing!
Calm yourself. We have to weigh our options carefully.
I'm more concerned about how little we know about our enemies...
She's right. I've set Dark Wind to digging up anything we can on $npcName:11001698$, but so far... nothing.
Even looking into $npc:11000044$'s activities turned out to be a dead end. The man knew how to cover his tracks.
So now we're left with no leads, and no answers.
Your Majesty, shall I tell them about the expedition?
Yes. But first, how many of you know about the lumarigons?
I've sent what few men I could spare to search for any trace of the lumarigons. This led us to look at Karkar Island.
A dragon-like man has been stirring up trouble there, it seems.
He's been asking around about the lumarigons, as well. I cannot say if this man is an ally or a foe, but we cannot turn a blind eye to him.
Since he tends to leave chaos in his wake, we need to be careful in how we proceed.
There's so much work ahead of us. We need to learn more about $npcName:11001698$, build up our armies, care for our people... And every one of these tasks is important.
But this man on Karkar Island may hold the answers to our questions.
Your Majesty, our forces are already stretched too thin. How can we spare anyone to look for this dragon man?
We will find a way. We must.
The very fate of our alliance may depend on this mission.
Urrrggg, I really don't want to teleport. Tria is so far.
Anyway... I, $npc:11003137$, have arrived under the command of the empress. Ah, so you were here as well, $MyPCName$?
I'll head off first. $MyPCName$, follow along! There's lots to be done.
We were victorious over $npcName:11001698$. Those that attacked Tria and Maple World got what they deserved.
Although $npcName:11001698$ escaped safely, it wasn't what she wanted.
$npc:11001698$ lost her closest friend in this battle.
Ack... I... I can't believe I lost...
Hurry and end it, you idiots...! I'll never become your prisoner...!
Slaves of light…! I'd rather die than become a hypocrite like you!
With that, we landed a final hit on $npcName:11001698$. It was vengenace for the royal guards of Tria! And for $npcName:11003178$.
Aaaaaaaaacccck!
Luka— Lukarax?!
But $npcName:11001698$ was safe, after all. Her dragon, $npcName:11003144$, took the final blow in her place.
Not just that, but Lukarax use the final bit of her strength to teleport $npcName:11001698$ to safety. To protect her...
$npcName:11003144$! What have you done...
Luka!! Luka!!
Luka! I'm coming! I'm going to go with $npcName:11003144$, too!
$npcName:11001698$ cried out for her dragon until she disappeared, and that marked the end of the Madrakan battle.
$npcName:11001698$ will surely return. And when that happens, all who we love will be in danger once more.
But we're searching for resolution that doesn't involve fighting $npcName:11001698$. Vengeance will only lead to ruin, for both sides.
Therefore I vowed to thoroughly investigate the "Destruction From Light" that awakened the rage within $npcName:11001698$.
Little did I know what the results of that vow would be. There was no way to tell then.
Wow. That's ridiculous.
How did this even happen?
Fine! Let them attack us. I'd like to see them try.
We'll squish them all like the pests they are!
While $npcName:11001822$ and Dark Wind were repelling $npcName:11001698$'s army, Oska and the militia were fighting another army at Shadow Canyon.
Prepare to attack!
Mission successful!
Meanwhile, $npcName:11001822$ and his Dark Wind forces were fighting $npcName:11001698$'s army in an empty field.
Dark Wind, engage. Kill everything!
Mission successful!
We've got you now!
There's nowhere to run!
Get down here! You're only making things worse for yourself.
The captain wants to see you!
Pirates?!
Who the heck are you?!
$npcName:11003086$. This guy is different from those pirates. Tell this person what you told me last time.
You look so different. Scared me there. If something dangerous is happening, let me know. Who knows? It might get resolved.
How naive of you, $npcName:11003085$. To want to help the humans... You don't know how pointless that is.
Humans will be the ones to push this world into extinction.
Although humans may not be the most perfect creatures...
They will not try to ruin this world if it's in danger.
Spare me. Humans can't even trust each other. They're too selfish.
Thanks to the returned mage of light, I've learned everything. I know of the destruction you'll bring to the world.
What?
Don't believe me? Then see for yourself.
Ah, $MyPCName$!
Come to your senses, little guy!
See? Now get lost.
Ee... Eeek... Wait!
What you showed me... I'm still not sure what it means.
But if someone's poor choices leads to a crisis...
Others will pool forces to block it. Please keep that in mind.
...How interesting, human.
Fine, I'll keep an eye out. I'll watch and see how whatever disaster comes next is handled.
But I wonder what the other Shinsoos will think of you... What they do is fully up to them. Remember that.
He's usually quite friendly... There must be a reason for his actions. Don't take it to the heart.
I'll talk it out some more... If there's something I need to tell you, I'll contact you. Also…
Would you deliver a message to $npcName:11000444$? Tell him that I hope he gets better soon... And that I'd like to see him again...
Are you blushing, $npcName:11003084$? You must like him a lot. He seemed rather ordinary to me...
I'll deliver the message. Thank you, $npcName:11003084$. Thank you, $npcName:11003085$.
You've failed to secure Empress $npcName:11001478$... Perhaps I've put too much trust in you, $npcName:11001698$.
But, $npcName:11001811$...! If $npcName:11001698$ had continued to use her strength there... $npcName:11001969$ may have turrned into an empress of destruction...
$npcName:11001811$ wanted $npcName:11001478$ alive and not awakened! $npcName:11001698$ didn't run away!
Also, we damaged their castle. Doesn't this mean $npcName:11001698$ succeeded?
...$npcName:11001698$. Keep this in mind.
You're a fool if you thought I'd give you a pat on the back for your failure.
You are as good as dead.
Gulp...!
You've lost your troops and made the enemy aware of our actions... Where exactly is the silver lining on that?
S-Sorry... $npcName:11001698$ is sorry...
Enough. I don't remember taking in such pitiful subordinates.
This is your last chance, $npcName:11001698$. This time, succeed.
Remember, there are 6 others who would love to use your failure as a stepping stone to their own success.
Fight with $npcName:11003144$ this time. I didn't give you that dragon for a pet.
Okay...
You're tardy. Again.

Heh... My sense of humor is unbeatable.

I'd rather blow it up than give it to the likes of you. $npcName:11003291$, do it!

Good idea. The blast shouldn't have gone too far beyond the lab, but it doesn't hurt to make sure.
Ah, right. The plaza. We built the lab under the plaza.
Remember, $npcName:11003291$. Stainless steel tombstone.
I will pay for the damages.
Taliskar's Greatest Alchemist

Old Kerning City

Kerning City... It's been a while.

The sewers...

The present...

How hurtful... Still, your analysis is fairly accurate.
I suppose you do possess some scholarly qualities, after all.
I'm relieved. I'd feared you would hold our research back.
Ha. Looks like those ears aren't just for show.
For future reference, I'm precise, not cold.
I'll keep that in mind.
How nice. It's been too long since I've engaged in such light banter.
And what have we here?
Right, right! $MyPCName$, this is $npcName:11003313$. Have you met?
$npcName:11000076$ told me that you were coming.
It's good to finally see someone reliable so far from $map:52000133$.
Einos
Scholar of Ellinel
$npcName:11003262$, did you notice anything odd about $npcName:11003313$? Perhaps he brought something back from the $map:02000146$? Or was he acting unusual?
Absolutely not. Professor $npcName:11003313$ is beyond reproach!
Something isn't adding up. Aren't you curious why $npcName:11003313$ changed?
Are you implying that $npcName:11003313$ has been tainted by the darkness? Preposterous! All those books you read are rotting your brain.
$npcName:11003262$! Apologize to $npcName:11003264$ this instant.
I'm not the one making wild accusations! Why do I have to apologize? Professor $npcName:11003313$ isn't some lab rat for us to study and dissect.
I'll find the professor myself. Even if you're right, it doesn't change anything.
Step aside, $MyPCName$.
Let her go, $MyPCName$. She needs some space.
I'll be going now.
When are we going after him?
We've got the royal guard. We've got to get that wraith before he slips away!
Be patient. We all want to go after him, but it's not yet time.
There's no way I heard you right. You're saying you want to wait?
The enemy has vanished into the shadows. The trail is cold. Believe me, I've already sent my best scouts after them.
This goes beyond $map:02000076$. $map:02000100$ was also attacked. All of Maple World is in danger.
We must report this to the empress. Make a plan. Learn who our enemies are and what they're trying to do.
My dad may never... may never get better. You wanna waste time kissing the empress's feet?!
I've got a better plan. We'll round up the villagers and go. That monster can't have gotten too far!
$npcName:11000015$ is right. We can't win this battle if we go in blind. My men are already preparing to return to $map:02000001$.
Those guys took out one of the Seven Heroes, and you already wanna leave? Are you stupid?!
And what gives you the right to say that? If it weren't for your recklessness, $npcName:11000001$ would still be awake.
Argh!
Fine. If no one else wants to go, I'll do it myself. I'll avenge my dad!
Wait...!
Hiya, $MyPCName$!
Long time, no see. How's it going?
Oh man, did something happen? It's really tense in here...
Do you know how long I've been looking for you?
$npcName:11003243$? What are you doing here?
$npcName:11000101$ told me all about your wild exploits. What are you going to do when your dad finds out?
I'm trying to make things right! If you aren't gonna help me, then get out of my way.
Ugh. You don't even get what's going on around you! When are you going to grow up?
Your dad is worried sick. This is all your fault, and you're just making things worse!
Even though he's an old man, $npcName:11003239$ still came out to help deal with the monsters in the $map:02000054$.
Wait, dad went to the $map:02000054$? Beyond the southwest checkpoint?
That's right. That's your patrol route. But you decided to run off, so the old man went there in your place!
He's too old to be out there.
It's time to prove myself! For real this time!
$npc:11003242$! Where are you going? Hey!
Jeez. I wish $npcName:11003239$ was my dad. I'd be a good kid...
You mentioned monsters in the $map:02000054$?
$MyPCName$! We didn't have enough manpower after the battle, so the elder decided to chip in.
It's not safe for him out there.
You're right. Please go to the $map:02000054$ and help out. $npcName:11000547$ should already be there.
$npcName:11003239$ went with $npcName:11000015$, so he's not completely helpless. I'd better go after $npcName:11003242$...
Who are you? What do you want with us?!
And what makes you think I have any desire or obligation to answer to you?
Were you behind the attack on $map:02000100$?
What's this? We have a celebrity in our midst. One of Maple World's greatest heroes, $npcName:11003308$.
But you are so old and feeble now. Naught but skin and bones! A shadow of your former self.
Silence! The likes of you aren't fit to even talk to him!
Do not be offended, elf. I am simply... concerned. The elderly should stay at home, where they can sleep away what little time they have left.
Don't you talk to my dad like that!
Ah, the son of the hero! I shall destroy you myself.
No! $npcName:11003364$!
Father...
$npcName:11003308$!
How disappointing. The former hero cannot even save his child's life, let alone his own.
In the end, mortal flesh is weak. Such a delicious tragedy.
Stop right there!
$MyPCName$? How intriguing! Unfortunately, my business here is done.
Dispose of them.
We have to get $npcName:11003308$ to safety. We don't have time for these goons!
$npcName:11003364$... Are you all right?
No... No, I'm not! You said I was useless. Pathetic... Then why did you...?
You can't just dive into danger like in the old days! Not for... not for my sake!
The only thing I fear in this world... is losing you...
I didn't want you to feel trapped under my shadow... So I pushed you to be your best... but all I've done is hurt you...
My heart ached as I watched you suffer. But it was all my doing... You are not to blame...
$npcName:11003364$... My son...
I believe in you. You can be great... even without me...
N-no... Father!!
Hello! I'm $npcName:11003253$, Ellinel freshman!
And I'm $npcName:11003252$. Pleased to meet ya!
Which one of you is the exceptional student $npcName:11003250$ told me about?
We're just freshmen, silly! Maybe we'll be exceptional next year.
Oh, we will be. I'm gonna be a hero, just like $MyPCName$!
$npcName:11003252$, you sound like an idiot.
Bright kids...
Ahem! We're here to take you to her. Follow us!
She's waiting for you on the school grounds. The class president herself, $npcName:11003146$.
$npcName:11003146$ is the best mage to ever study here, ever. She's the Queen of Ellinel, as smart as she is pretty!
She's just some rich brat who clings to $npcName:11000032$'s robe. Being the teacher's pet doesn't make her smart!
That's pretty harsh...
Anyway, how can I become a great adventurer like you, $MyPCName$? I want $npcName:11000032$ and the headmaster to send me on quests, too!
Adventuring is my dream job! Please, tell me!
There's not really much to it...
Just ignore him. That's what the rest of us do.
$npcName:11003253$, you twerp!
About $npcName:11003146$. I wouldn't take anything she says personal, if I were you...
I'm going to tell $npcName:11003146$ you said that!
Go ahead! I don't care!
We're here. Just go through the door.
We better get to class. See ya later!

Remember, I'm doing this for $npcName:11000032$...

Ellinel Class President

Come with me to the $map:52000134$ and you'll find out.

I'm sure you can take care of whatever it is without my help.
I don't have time to deal with those brats. The professor needs my assistance with his very important research!
Oh, $MyPCName$!
I was just thinking about you.
Professor! How's your research going?
Well... There's one experiment I haven't been able to reproduce. I suspect you know the one I'm talking about.
The experiment with the aino crystal?
That's right. No matter how hard I try, I can't replicate our results. I'm missing something...
Could it be $MyPCName$? $male:He,female:She$ may have some innate trait that tainted the results. Like the spiritual equivalent of sneezing on a Petri dish.
Or maybe I forgot to wash my hands before touching the reagents. Who can say? All I know is that I can't concentrate for too long since that experiment. I've even blacked out a few times.
Ah, but don't worry about me. One doesn't get into magical research without being prepared for such risks.
That's true. Even our freshmen are fearless. Honestly, sneaking into the professor's magical supplies and running off into the wilderness...
He said he wanted to be like $MyPCName$. Imagine that! These kids have no sense in their heads.
A freshman... took from my supplies...?
Tell me everything. Now!
This is an aino crystal. We used them when we originally sealed away the Land of Darkness.
If my hypothesis is correct, then this crystal will react if we place a $item:20000045$ near it.
$MyPCName$, would you do the honor? I've got a spare $item:20000045$ if you need it.
Look, it's reacting! That means that the mushrooms themselves are aligned with the darkness.
After I came up with my little hypothesis, I created a special soil to let me cultivate $itemPlural:20000045$.
When cultivated, the mushrooms seemed to attract monsters. Most informative... if annoying.
By extracting energy from the $itemPlural:20000045$, I was able to devise a treatment for shadow poisoning. I'm sure you recall the $item:20000016$ I had you make.
Normally, shadow poisoning burrows deep into its victim and hides. It's hard enough to detect, let alone treat... and here we have a potential cure in our hands!
Impressive. Have you reported this to our allies?
Not yet. This is still far too experimental to share.
This crystal...
Ack!
No!
What happened?

I didn't do anything. I just...

The goddesses created many worlds beyond Maple World, and the nova come from one such world called Grandis.
He's from another planet...?
Indeed. In the past, it was possible to cross between worlds through interdimensional doors.
But those doors vanished with the goddesses. How did such a person make it here? That is a mystery.
But what does he want? Why come all this way for the Lumenstone?
I can't rightly say. He called himself $npcName:11003053$, and as he left, he chanted...
Kaiser...
I believe that is the protector of the nova royal family. Why would he want to become their guardian?
He hungers for power. I could tell that much from the look in his eyes.
Trouble! We're in trouble! We found Mika... but so did that monster!
Where?!
In the sanctum of Nazkar Temple! You have to hurry!
Tell $npcName:11001292$ right away. Hurry!
Will do. I'll leave Mika to you!
I can sense the remnants of the past here. It rings throughout this area strongly. An extremely wealthy person lived in this manor.
...Unexpected guests have arrived...
Well, no matter. I'm sure you're curious about this place as well...
Can you feel it? These powerful evil spirits... It's rare to come across so many spirits. They must carry a strong grudge.
Welcome to the Cursed Mansion. I hope you find the answer you seek...
Countless spirits have appeared in the middle of the hall through the magic seal. Let's search the manor to see if there are other magic seals in this area.
Try eating the materials!
Avoid the flying projectiles and survive until the end. That's the rule.
I'll transform you. Stealthily defeat the pirates with your changed abilities.
Choosing between the wooden box and the rock, move the object that meets the conditions to the sparkling area.

<font size='60'>$map:02100000$</font>

Can you believe this cold? Even though it's just a simulation, my teeth are chattering! I hope you packed a warm jacket.

Anyway, you'll need a plan to deal with the cold. You see, there's an even bigger problem to take care of...

A monster has set up shop at the top of the mountain. I don't know how it got there. It's not part of the program!

I tried to delete it, but the simulation isn't responding to my commands. You'll need to take care of it the old fashioned way.

Good luck!
Find a way to protect yourself from the cold.
The entrance will close in 30 seconds.
Mission failed.
Mission complete!
<font size='60'>$map:02100001$</font>\n\nIn this desolate wasteland, you must be strong to survive! Can you complete the Rites of the Apeullela and prove your worth?

<FONT color='#ffd200'>The test</FONT> involves<FONT color='#ffd200'> gathering five types of energy</FONT> from the nearby area.

Once you pass the test, you will be accepted as a member of the Apeullela. If not... you'll be abandoned to the wilderness!

There's no need to be so serious: this is just good ol' VR!

Ah, I think I hear the chief calling for you. I bid you good luck!
Gather <FONT color='#ffd200'>five types of energy</FONT> from near our village! Feel free to ask the members of our tribe details about the energy.

Once you're <FONT color='#ffd200'>full of energy</FONT>, take the energy <FONT color='#ffd200'>and place it in the jars</FONT> you see behind me. If you gather all five types of energy within <FONT color='#ffd200'>five minutes</FONT>, we will welcome you as a friend.
Mission failed.
Oh, you're in for it now!
Mission success!
Amazing! The Apeullela accept you as one of their own!
The cage door closes in 30 seconds.

<font size='60'>$map:02100002$</font>

For years slimes have been used for all manner of things. From dyes, potions, and cosmetics to building materials like cement, slimes find their way into everything.

It was only natural that people took to breeding them, and eventually, the large scale manufacture of artificial slimes.

That's right, slimes were even mass-produced in factories!

On the topic of what goes jiggle in the night, perhaps you've heard of the fabled Rainbow Slime?

First described by the ancient philosopher Bearistotle, the Rainbow Slime is said to be a resplendent and beautiful creature whose extract would cure any ailment, and could be used to produce an elixir of eternal youth. Of course, there hasn't been so much as a verifiable sighting in centuries.

Nevertheless many attempted to give life to the fantastical slime by mixing ordinary, colored slimes. However, the practice has long been outlawed. Perhaps it was too dangerous?

Ah, but I'm rambling. The purpose of this simulation is to finally determine whether there's any truth to the myth of the Rainbow Slime... By making one!\n\nAs you can see, this factory has two sections a slime mixing facility below, and a melting facility above. Your success in this experiment depends upon your allocating a sufficient number of individuals to each section.

The melting facility on the upper floor has <FONT color='#ffd200'>5 slime extruders</font>, which will continuously release slimes once the factory is operational. It is the task of those in the melting facility to lure the colored slimes into the <FONT color='#ffd200'>$npc:34000141$</font>, filling the color meter in the room below. More on that later.\n\nBe warned that the manufacturing process will result in volatile $npcPlural:34000121$. If they are allowed to reach the $npc:34000141$, the results could be catastrophic. Also, note that the individual slime extruders can be turned on and off using the levers on the upper floor.

Those within the mixing facility on the lower floor have two main roles. First is supplying dye to the slime extruders. Simply pick up the dye cannisters, and carry them over to the slime extruder of the same color to fill its tank. The more dye in the tank, the larger the slimes that will be extruded above. The larger the slime lured into the $npc:34000141$ above, the faster the color meter will fill. The second role is monitoring the color meter which indicates how many of the required slimes have been melted down. If any color enters the red section of the gauge, you've added too many. The creation of a Rainbow Slime requires bringing all 5 color meters as close to the limit as possible without going over.
Move to one of the work rooms.\nThe left portal leads to the Mixing Station.\nThe right portal leads to the Melting Station.
Pull the lever in the mixing room to initiate the manufacturing process.
The slime extruder has been activated.
The results are now available.
Mission failed.
Mission complete!
The portals will close in 30 seconds. Once this occurs, you will no longer be able to travel between floors.

Ah, the Eternal Arena! This underground fighting ring is the Land of Darkness's worst-kept secret.

They say that the twin champions of the arena are among the strongest in the world. They say that the brothers have impenetrable defenses and love to pound humans into jelly.

But you aren't scared, are you?
Go ahead, take your best shot. Just don't let the two beasts get too close to each other. Or too close to you, for that matter!\n\nI'm sure you'll figure it out. Good luck!

You're alive...! I've missed you so much.
Your majesty! I never thought I'd see you again... Thank goodness you're unharmed!
My beloved, $npcName:11003074$... We are finally reunited at last. Oh how I've longed for this day.
Your Majesties! I hate to interrupt your reunion, but I have to tell you... The frozen crystal's seal is unstable.
We'd better get out of here and seal the path.
$npcName:11003075$...! What are you doing...?!
Leave? After how long I've waited for this day? That's absurd...
Ugh... My king... Why...?
It's time to begin the ritual! Anyone who seeks to interfere will face death.
$npcName:11000004$... Your injuries are serious. You need treatment immediately.
Adventurer, I have a request. Please follow $npcName:11003075$. I'll catch up after I've tended to $npcName:11000004$'s wounds.
You are either very brave or very stupid to ignore my warning, human.
With this power, I am stronger than ever. I can finally restore my kingdom.
$npcName:11003075$... What really happened? We waited day and night for you and our missing countrymen to return...
$npcName:11003074$, my love... Now that we are together again, we can start anew.
All that remains is to begin the ritual.
...$npcName:11003075$. This place seethes with darkness. What is this "ritual" you speak of...?
A mysterious benefactor gifted me the 'Power of Darkness' so that together, you and I can unseal the frozen crystal.
Come, take my hand. Let us use this power to free the crystal, and build a kingdom that shall live on for eternity.
$npcName:11003075$, have you forgotten why our ancestors sealed the crystal and this temple away?
If the crystal overloads, the entire world will be buried in ice. Innumerable lives will be lost in the cold!
What concern is that to us?
$npcName:11003075$! What are you saying...?
This world was built upon the sacrifices we have made, yet it teeters on the edge of chaos. There is nothing here worth saving.
It is time to restore our kingdom. My dear, sweet $npcName:11003074$...
Let us blanket this world in unending snow, and rebuild our kingdom such that it may never fall again.
$npcName:11003075$... You've changed...
For days beyond counting my heart has ached for your return... But the man for whom I've waited is not the man who stands before me.
This world is theirs now. Our time has ended.
You have not seen the beauty of their world... the colors of spring, of life. This frozen world of ours, despite its beauty, pales in comparison.
Our world has no more right to exist than theirs... In making that exchange, you would be no different than those who brought ruin to our kingdom.
I will not let you unseal the frozen crystal!
I will defend the crystal, and this world! Just as you and I defended our land so long ago!
The darkness is receding... Open your eyes, $npcName:11003075$!
So even the darkness has abandoned me... Hah. Hahaha...
So long was I lost within the depths of darkness in this forsaken land. Without you, the dark was my only companion.
And yet in all that time, my thoughts were only of you.
I never imagined that you, out of everyone, would abandon me.
$npcName:11003075$...! What are you talking about...?!
Listen carefully, $npcName:11003074$. I will never give up on my dream. When I return, I will usher in the dawn of a new world.
....Even if you stand against me!
$npcName:11003074$님…
$MyPCName$, I'm sorry.
I have foolishly endangered my friends, all to rescue a man better left dead...
I think our luck's run out...
Well... At least I get to go down fighting with someone like you by my side...
Though, it's a shame I wasn't able to unravel the secret of the dragons.
Tch... I can't believe I'm thinking about that 'fool'...
Well, they're not taking us down without a fight!
Lucky for you, teleportation is within the purview of spatial magic!
Grr... My fortress... My beautiful fortress...
You... insects! I won't forgive you for this!
But I can't face the $npc:11003894$ like this...
There'll be no end to his scolding. No—this time, he might not forgive me at all.
Luka! Let's get out of here, just you and me.
If we face the $npc:11003894$ after losing Madrakan and the dark crystal to the servants of light, there's no doubt he'll kill us. No! I've suffered enough!
But to surrender to the servants of light... I'd rather kill myself!
So... Why don't we just run away? You'll come with me, won't you?
$npc:11003144$, you're all I need... As long as I'm with you, I can go anywhere!
Let's run away together, Luka!
And when the time comes... We'll find a way to have our revenge on the servants of light!
Then the $npc:11003894$ will be sure to forgive us! He'll take us back!
Over here, little landwalker.
This is the pirates' lair.
How dare they block our path!
Calm down, $npcName:11003085$. We need to find $npcName:11003086$.
...Fine.
Hmm. Let's see...
Got it!
Then let's move!

Papa's friend was gonna tell something to me and Mr. Hotelier. But... he went away.
I have no one. Not papa, not papa's friend...
But... I...

Fools like that child. Fools who think they'll find the will and live.

Return my will!

Papa...

But...

Be careful!

<FONT color='#ffd200'>$npcName:11004345$'s Diary</FONT>

$npcName:11004346$ was furious today just because I dog-eared a page in his book.
How else was I supposed to remember my place? 
That anti-social bookworm acted like I was some kind of monster! He's so mean! I wish he would just go live with his books and leave me alone.
It's so much easier to be happy when you're younger... Isn't it, Bo—
...Sigh. What am I even doing? Talking to a fairfolk I probably dreamed up...
But... I'm so lonely. I just don't want to be lonely for the holidays anymore.
...I should just sleep on it.

Me too! Sweets! Sweets!
Me too!
Me too!

They ate all... Sorry...
But... You got wish! You got in cake.
Time to make new wishes!
...Ugh, that furry brute. What is all this?
Are you okay?
Perhaps. Who are you, exactly?
I've been looking for you. $npcName:11004354$ and $npcName:11004359$ wanted me to find you.
Ah, my children! Are they safe?
They're fine. They're waiting for you in the living room.
Thank goodness. I'll meet you there, then.
Sorry... Need to make wishes true. Bobo let you down when Bobo is reindeer.
Gah... Buh...
Hey, what's the big idea? Let him go!
Huh? What wrong? Bobo make wish come true. $npcName:11004356$ wish.
That's not $npcName:11004356$'s wish! $npcName:11004356$ wants to be with her father, $npcName:11004368$! So put him down now!
No! $npcName:11004356$ wrote in diary.
$npcName:11004356$ dad stay here. $npcName:11004373$ do good.
This is going nowhere...
What are you even doing?
$npcName:11004373$ do good deeds so Santa like $npcName:11004373$.
Bobo be so happy when reindeer. Bobo play with $npcName:11004356$, too.
If get in Bobo's way...
<font size='40'>Bobo hit you!</font>
Ah, you've saved me. Much appreciated!
Now then... who are you?

<FONT color='#ffd200'>Diary Page 52</FONT>\nI hate dad. How could he get on me because of some stupid flowers? If flowers are more precious than me, then you should just stay in your dumb garden forever! Mr. $npcName:11004368$!

I figured I could spend some time up my beloved tree for that.
No, Dad!
I was just complaining. That wasn't my wish!
Huh?
But... $npcName:11004356$ wish? Bobo do... bad?
Bobo... It really was you who heard me that night.
Sorry... So sorry! Bobo want make happy. Make wishes!
$npcName:11004373$ very sorry!
It's okay, fuzzy. Your heart was in the right place, I guess. But $npcName:11004356$'s wish is something else.
Yes. When she tells you her real wish, make that one come true.
I'm sorry, everyone. It's my fault this all happened.

Now I can finally have the happy holiday party I wanted. With my family!

Sky Fortress Bridge
A brand new continent! Think they'll have exotic torture devices?
I'm more interested in as yet undiscovered schools of magic.
You two need to get your priorities straight. We have foreign cuisines to sample—
Huh?
What's this...?!
Captain! We have an unidentified radar contact!
What? Location and heading?
Two kilometers off the starboard bow, approaching at high speed!
It's moving too fast, there's no time for evasive maneuvers!
All hands, secure your stations and brace for impact!
Ma'am!
WARNING. Collision imminent! Collision imminent!
AHHHHH!
It can't be...
The unidentified object has vanished from radar.
It vanished?
I want an analysis.
Based on these energy readings, it seems it detonated before impact.
It... detonated?!
So are we going to talk about Condor screaming like a little girl...?
What?! We're in the middle of a crisis here!
He's right. Our priority is identifying the source of the attack.
Negative.
Our first priority is finding a safe place for Sky Fortress to land.
Our mystery assailants may be long gone by then.
Um...
Hmm?
I'll go.
I'll go down and find out who attacked us.
I don't think venturing off to some uncharted continent alone is such a good idea, Kitten.
I agree. It's just too dangerous, $MyPCName$.
But if we don't act now, we may never get answers.
...Very well.
But Captain!
You may go under one condition.
Promise you'll be careful.
...Aye, Captain.
Protect the altar. Don't let the aetherine condenser get destroyed!
This looks dangerous.
This won't survive a hit from that guy's hammer.
Fools... Didn't I tell you to be careful?
Now!
Paika! Stop them!
Why do you stand in my way?!
The forces of darkness, here?!
If they set up the missile batteries they used to attack Sky Fortress, they had to have known we were coming.
But who took them all out?
I guess you were really hungry...
You there. Identify yourselves.
Are you with those cloaked monsters?
No way.
I came here to find them. They attacked my ship.
Amazing. You did this all on your own?
Err... Not exactly.
Can you tell me what the forces of darkness are doing here?
You mean the Daemon Army? Their ship landed in the forest outskirts. Our patrols are en route to engage them.
Protocol says to bring you both in for questioning... But I suspect you'd put up quite the fight.
I'm afraid I've got my own mission to complete. However, this woman is in need of medical attention.
She must be an exile. We'll take her back to base.

Later...
Turka... Come in Turka...
Ngh... Target... located...
Prepare to... receive data...
Trans... mit... ting...

Did it get absorbed into your body?

I don't know what you're talking about... I can't remember anything...
I can't even remember who I am...
You lost your memory sealing Kritias? Preposterous.
No matter. The power of the Blue Lapenta will be ours, as soon as we extract it from your body!
Activate the machine.
What?! How did you— I see. You used us to awaken the lapenta power inside you...
So when did your memory return? Or perhaps you never lost it...
I remembered everything the moment I glimpsed the face underneath that facade you wear.
When I realized what you were, I knew you'd stop at nothing to take the lapenta from me.
Hahahah. You're right about that. Seize her!
Ugh... The Blue Lapenta did this?
Grr... Don't think that this is over!

Think how much your people have suffered. Is protecting her really worth all this?
Enough.
No one else will suffer on my behalf.
No! You can't!
I'll be fine. Don't worry.
Heheheh... You've made a wise decision. Now, move!

Ah, wait! Go with me!
Thank you for coming, Captain $npcName:11004616$. I'm sorry this meeting has been so delayed.
It's fine. Honestly, I'm glad that $npcName:11004580$ will finally stop hassling me about this.
But first, tell me more about your problems.
Then I shall cut to the heart of the matter.
Humanitas is facing a critical shortage of manpower.
Explain.
$npcName:11004615$, if you please.
Yes, Ma'am.
Ever since we allied up with the Maple Alliance, our enemies have been relentless.
The Daemon Army and Tairen surround $map:02020030$. Kharon nips at our heels wherever we go.
We get more and more injured every day, and our troops are nearly falling asleep on their feet from exhaustion. We can't keep this up.
Our problems don't end there. We also face innumerable logistical challenges...
In other words, Humanitas can't go on like this.
As much as it pains me to admit it...
We need your aid.
Understood. As your ally, we'll do whatever we can to help.
Truly...?
I will personally dispatch my best $male:man,female:woman$ for the job.
You have my deepest gratitude, Captain $npcName:11004616$.
Yeah. Thanks.
Meanwhile, Claudia...
Is $npcName:11004575$ inside?
...You finally came.\n$npcName:11004603$.

This room is always new...
You are?!

His appearance is sudden...

My true master is no one but me!
Everyone, get ready for battle!
What is that thing saying?

I will get rid of this fake utopia with my hands and establish a true utopia.

$map:02000536$ 입구를 찾을 때까지 앞으로 나아갑시다.\n길을 따라가세요.
[흑성회 조직원들과 대결]\n$map:02000555$에서 당신의 능력을 증명하세요.\n흑성회와의 대결에서 승리해 보상을 획득합시다.
$map:02000536$ 입구를 발견했습니다.\n문 옆의 보안 장치를 작동시켜 잠금을 해제합시다.
[보안 시스템과 대결]\n지금부터 나타나는 숫자를 빠르게 입력해 보도록 합시다.\n3번 실패하면 보안 시스템이 당신을 응징할 거예요.
[성공]\n정확하게 입력하셨네요.\n$map:02000536$ 입구가 열립니다.
[실패]\n보안 시스템이 당신을 싫어합니다.\n잠금 장치가 활성화됩니다.
에잇! 실패하다니…
[인내심과 대결]\n어쩔 수 없네요. 그냥 힘으로 여세요.
뭐야, 문이 열린 거야? 그렇다면… 내가 나설 차례군!
입구를 발견했어.
[흑성회 간부와 대결]
후후. 여기까지 들어오다니, 대단한걸?
도전하는 건 네 마음이지만, 성공과 실패를 결정하는 건 내 마음이란다~\n자, 덤벼!
흑성회 간부 $npcName:11004704$$pp:를,을$ 쓰러트리세요!
제법인걸? 혼자 이곳에 들어올만 해~ 칭찬해 줄게.
지겹게 하는군. 그럼 이제 슬슬 놀아볼까?
좀 하는데? 인정해 줘야겠군!
까마득한 성채를 따라 내려가야 합니다.\n몰려오는 어둠을 조심하세요.
인간? 이게 얼마 만에 맡아보는 냄새인지 아주 향긋하군. 천천히 어둠 속으로 내려오라고.
불쌍한 인간.... 샘은 이미 너를 주시하고 있어. 어둠이 너를 쫓을거야.
어둠의 샘이 당신의 존재를 눈치챘습니다.\n생명을 탐하는 검은 화살이 당신을 뒤쫓습니다.
수백 년간 잠들어 있던 샘이 깨어났어. 샘은 영혼을 원해.
거미.... 난 거미가 싫어... 거미는 영혼을 옭아매는 자...
샘은 거미의 눈을 빌려 모든걸 감시하고 있어. 조심하는게 좋아.
얼마나 더 기다려야 하는 거야? 빨리 내려와 보라고.
불쌍한 사람. 여기 들어온 이상 나가긴 힘들어.
샘이 너의 영혼을 속박할 거야.
그래 마치 우리처럼....
그렇지! 겨우 여기까지 왔군. 네 영혼도 샘에 바쳐주마!
네가 어디로 가게 될지.... 우린 알 수 없어. 여긴 뒤틀린 미지의 공간. 모든 것은 샘의 뜻대로....
끝없는 어둠을 뚫고 아래로 내려가야 합니다.
너무 걱정하지마. 우리가 길을 알려줄께.
보이는 것도, 보이지 않는 것도 믿을 수 없는 길....
무슨 일이 일어나도 너무 놀라지마.
샘을 만나기 전까진 괜찮을거야.
이 곳은 생명이 있는 자는 들어올 수 없는 곳. 샘이 계속 널 아래로 이끌고 있어.
우리처럼 여기에 묶이지마. 너라도 이 곳을 나갈 수 있었으면 좋겠어.
아무것도 보이지 않는다고 해서 길이 없는 것은 아니야. 길은 보이지 않는 곳에 있어.
무섭겠지만 날 믿어. 내가 열어줄게.
여긴 어둠의 공간. 살아있는 생명은 여길 넘어갈 수 없어. 내가 열어줄게.
여긴 오래전에 다리가 부서졌어. 여기에 들어오면 아무 곳도 못 가고 갇히게 되지.
위에는 길이 없어. 조용히 아래로 내려와.
남은 힘으로 다리를 만들어 줄게. 따라와.
우린 걱정하지 마. 우린 괜찮아.
여기엔 조금 시끄러운 녀석이 길을 지키고 있어. 그가 모르게 여길 지나갈 수 있을까?
이미 지켜보고 있을지도 몰라. 그는 냄새를 잘 맡으니까.
이번엔 위쪽이야. 위로 올라와.
다리를 만들어 주는 게 좋은 건지 고민하게 돼. 샘을 만나지 않는 게 덜 괴로울지도 몰라.
그의 소리가 들려. 그가 널 맞이할 거야.
아래로 내려가는 문이 열렸어. 어둠이 눈치채기 전에 빨리 이동하자.
살아있는 인간의 냄새...
여기 밑에서 이상한 소리가 들려... 조심하는게 좋아...
여기가 어딘지 아는거야?
어둠은 위에서 부터 스며들어오고 있어...
중앙의 다리를 건너가야 해...
포탈을 타고 사원으로 이동하세요.
인간의 냄새가 난다.
간만에 보는 고기덩어리로군...
사원이 빛을 되찾게 되면, 내려가는 입구가 보일거야.
맛있는 냄새가 나는군...
사원의 불을 밝혀주세요.
첫번째 불이 켜졌습니다.
이 정도론 부족해. 4개의 등불을 모두 밝혀야 할 것 같아.
겁도 없이 아래로 내려가려고 하는게냐? 순순히 여기서 우리의 밥이 되어라.
사원의 불을 밝혀주세요.
두번째 불이 켜졌습니다.
사원의 불을 모두 밝히면, 밑으로 내려갈 수 있어.
멍청한 생명체들이 겁도 없이 여길 들어오는 군.
사원의 불을 밝혀주세요.
세번째 불이 켜졌습니다.
맛있는 냄새가 나는군.
사원의 불을 밝혀주세요.
모든 사원의 불이 켜졌습니다.\n중앙으로 내려가는 포탈을 찾으세요.
이 빛이 얼마나 유지될진 모르겠지만 그리운 느낌이야.
누군가 오고 있어.
이 밑에서 샘의 냄새가 나.
감옥 문을 열고 이동하세요.
여기로 왔구나.
여긴 샘에 붙잡힌 영혼들이 모여 있어.
나도 여기에 갇혀 있었어.
여길 지키는 자는 아주 간사해.
감옥 문을 열고 사다리로 이동하세요.
어서 가...
조금이라도 늦으면 너도 결국 우리처럼 갇히고 말 거야.
인간.... 인간의 냄새가 나....
이곳에서 도망쳐....
원래 왔던 곳으로 돌아가, 어서!
여기서 나가고 싶어.
감옥에서 나가고 싶어....
여기서.... 감옥에서 나가고 싶어....
우리처럼 갇히기 전에 어서 도망쳐.
그 녀석이 오고 있어.
그 녀석이야.
도망쳐.
우릴 이곳에 가둔 녀석의 냄새.
그 녀석이 오고 있어. 우릴 이곳에 가둔 녀석.
어둠이 몰려오기 전에 어서 여기서 나가.
여기 밑은 더 어둡고 무서운 녀석이 있어. 조심해.
제물 바치기
여긴... 생명을 바쳐야 열리는 문이 있어.
저 문이 보여? 문에 깃든 샘의 힘이.... 네 생명을 원하고 있어.
영혼이 필요해.
침입자의 영혼.... 저 영혼을 가져와.
샘이 하수인을 불러냈어. 오랜 시간 잠들어 있었으니... 아직 제대로 된 힘을 낼 수 없을거야.
저 녀석의 영혼을 내게 바쳐라!
오른쪽 문에서 소리가 들려 옵니다.
왼쪽 문에서 소리가 들려 옵니다.
생각보다 맛있어 보이는 영혼이군. 네 영혼을 꼭 그분께 바치겠다.
양쪽 문에서 소리가 들려 옵니다.
제법이로군. 우리에게 실패는 용납되지 않는다. 가라 나의 부하들이어.
알 수 없는 기운이 느껴집니다.\n몸을 움직일 수 없습니다.
어둠의 여신이시어. 분노를 거두시고 한 번만 더 기회를 주십시오.
제... 제발..... 크아아악!
하수인의 영혼이 소멸하며 거대한 바람을 일으킵니다.
달콤한 영혼의 맛.
배불러. 그만 먹어도 되겠어.
다행히 하수인의 생명을 대가로 문이 열렸어.
나오너라. 나의 아이들아...
나오너라. 나의 아이들아...
드디어 여기까지 왔구나. 여긴 샘이 잠들어 있는 곳이야.
바보같은 녀석이 또 겁도 없이 샘에 가까이 왔군. 너도 여기 갇히고 싶어?
뭐 너도 도망가긴 틀렸어. 샘이 너의 존재를 알아챘어. 공격해 올꺼야.
샘이 움직이려고 하고 있어.
어둠을 부르고 있어.
어둠에 잡히게 되면 끝이야.
따뜻한 생명의 냄새. 저 자의 생명을 나에게 가져와라.

넌 밖으로 나갈 수 있어.

Balon's Prison
You're Balon... one of the former Seven Heroes.
Who are you? I've never seen you before, newbie.
I've heard that the dark matter is your work. Why are you doing this?

Don't mess with me.\nI've heard everything from Karl! Stop scheming.\nOtherwise I will kill you.
...Now you're even trying to get rid of me, Karl.
Did Cerian fail in the end?\n What the hell is happening in Maple World right now!
I don't know what you're talking about.\nStop scattering the darkness in Tria this moment!
…Hmph.\nMaybe this will teach you to listen, brat.
Don't get cocky, I've only just begun.
Huh, you're more persistant than I thought.
This punk...what?
Fella, there is something weird with you...
Ugh... Ugh...
(Wait…something's strange. I've heard from Karl that Balon is tainted with darkness…)
(This power I feel coming from Balon right now... It's not darkness, it feels like it's holy.)
(There is something wrong. This rookie...)
($male:He,female:She$ has an infinitely righteous soul.)
The heat…!
This place…is already on fire.

…Got it.
Don't worry, Empress.
Oh…!

!!!\n그만두지 못해!!!

세상이…!

This way!
Cough, cough!

Be careful!

?! Empress Ereve is here...?
All right. Let's go over there!

Let's catch up after we escape.

It's open!
Hurry up, kiddo!
Meanwhile...
Karl, you're here.\nIs there an urgent matter you need to talk about?
… Yes. This is very important..
What happened? Come on, let's talk.
Actually... it's about $MyPCName$.
When it comes to $MyPCName$, I'm sure $male:he,female:she$ must have done something praiseworthy...
What was it this time…?
$male:He,female:She$... met the Black Mage.
And has been corrupted.
Empress...!
Karl, what... did you just say?\nRepeat yourself.
It is as I said.\n$MyPCName$... $male:he,female:she$ met the Black Mage, and has joined the forces of darkness.
$male:He,female:She$ met the Black Mage in the empty prison tower,\nand was caught at the scene while plotting a scheme!
And then...?
They were locked up in a cell immediately upon discovery.\nTria's hero is… no more.
I can't believe this. Is that a lie? \nKarl. Please tell me the truth.
It is an undeniable truth.\nA guard who was on duty at the time saw it. Do you want me to bring in witnesses?
My goodness...
Please, give me... some time to think.
Let's... talk again tomorrow.
Yes. I'll take my leave now.
After a while...
…It's not difficult if it's a request from the Royal Prime Minister.\nBut do I really have to go this far?
This… This is the most correct path for Maple World.
Ladin.

I should set the prison tower on fire tonight, right?
